title: Shinogi Chess Club
description: At Yoshino High School, all that matters is your skill in Shinogi Chess. As the Spring Championships approach, student competitor Himiko Masaki investigates a dangerous organization. Climb the ranks, make new friends (and enemies), and search for answers in Shinogi Chess Club!

title: 《Sherlock Holmes The Awakened》尊享版
description:
尊享版包含：
-《Sherlock Holmes The Awakened》
- 低语之梦支线合集包
- 数字壁纸套装
-《Sherlock Holmes The Awakened》原声带
-《Sherlock Holmes The Awakened》艺术集

title: Sherlock Holmes The Awakened 原声带
description:
《Sherlock Holmes The Awakened》的诡秘配乐将带你沉浸式体验阴郁迷离的游戏氛围。
本作配乐由 Viacheslav Pakalin 创作并录制，每首歌曲都渲染了克苏鲁背景之下的诡异与朦胧氛围。

title: 《Sherlock Holmes The Awakened》豪华版
description:
豪华版包含：
-《Sherlock Holmes The Awakened》
- 低语之梦支线合集包
- 数字壁纸套装
《The Awakened》向我们讲述了夏洛克与室友乔如何成为闻名世界的探案二人组的故事。

title: Sherlock Holmes The Awakened - 低语之梦
description: 揭开惊险刺激的支线任务，探索主线之外的冒险旅程。体验新的故事，走进神秘事件，展开大胆调查，这一切无疑不尽情满足你的探案渴望。

title: Sherlock Holmes The Awakened 艺术集
description: 该艺术集为你精彩呈现超 100 页的丰富内容，邀你深入领略“夏洛克邂逅克苏鲁”扣人心弦的怪诞世界，一同踏上紧张刺激的探险旅程。

title: 《Dead Island 2》免费造型包
description: 在这个取材自《DEAD ISLAND 2》的免费造型包中，地狱洛杉矶与怪诞狂野的西部相会了，内含新造型、武器、表情动作与一个全新的总部收藏品！

title: 《Hotel Renovator》可爱的家具套装
description: 通过可爱的家具套装，给你的客人带来超级卡哇伊住宿体验。可爱的家具套装包含 53 件超萌物品，能够融化任何一位客人的心，给你的酒店增添活力风采。鲜艳色彩和趣味图案，让生活如阳光灿烂，如彩虹绚丽！

title: 《狙击精英5》Death From Above Weapon and Skin Pack
description: 赛季第二张通行证的第二个内容包带来了一款佩德森（Pedersen）外观的全新步枪、一款武器皮肤和两款角色皮肤。

title: Undead Horde
description: 成为死灵法师并让死者复活。《Undead Horde》是一款关于亡灵题材的动作RPG以及RTS游戏。玩家可以利用追随你的不死亡灵军队，通过指挥和带领它们尽情地以你所想的方式进行摧毁、抢夺以及战斗，并夺回那个Undead Horde王国！

title: Jawbreaker Demo
description: Will you survive when the world falls apart? Jawbreaker is a survival horror game that will have you running, hiding, and fighting in a terrifying gang-infested society on the verge of collapse. Though that’s not all, once the sun goes down the true fear begins...

title: Precious Stones
description: This is a physics-based platform game where players control a sphere to collect diamonds while avoiding obstacles and hazards. The game requires players to use their knowledge of physics to navigate through levels filled with slopes and moving platforms.

title: 《Hi-Fi RUSH》：Bossplay 套装包
description: 帮阿茶和伙伴换上这六套《Hi-Fi RUSH》残酷主管的套装吧！Bossplay 套装包含六套造型套装，每位角色一套，在游戏中前往秘密基地即可换穿。

title: Get Together: A Coop Adventure
description: Two lost beings and you are the only bond... Play with a friend to guide and reunite them on their journey in this communication-based coop puzzle adventure. You play on two devices with no connection except your voice!

title: 混沌银河
description: 一款像素风格的回合制银河全面战争。您可以选择14个势力，61名提督，上百个舰艇和机甲兵种，指挥多支舰队在银河大地图上进行大战略作战和外交、内政行动。

title: Super Smash Asteroids
description: "Super Smash Asteroids" is a high-speed, twin-stick, top-down, rogue-like space shooter. Choose from 6 unique ships, upgrade with 70+ items & blast through epic bosses. Level up for intense, action-packed battles in a futuristic universe.

title: The Gravehouse
description: Take on the role of a defenseless man in this survival-horror game and experience evil firsthand: A trap leads you straight into a gloomy mansion where gruesome things are going on. A creepy life and death adventure begins that will take you to dark cellars and even worse places.

title: 武士幸存者 -战姬当千-
description: 武士幸存者 -战姬当千-是一款充满动作感的肉鸽游戏。而我们的新游戏将为玩家带来更加极致的近战体验。在这款游戏中，玩家将通过近战武士刀的砍杀以及灵敏的回避系统来体验游戏的爽快感。每一次挥刀都会令你的血液沸腾，而每一次精准的回避都会让你感到一股惊人的成就感。

title: Lost Abroad Cafe - A Language Learning Management
description: Lost Abroad Café: a language learning game that puts you in the role of a virtual café owner in another country. Learn and use your new language to serve your customers and grow your business!

title: Spaceman Defender
description: A New Retro Classic Defender Arcade Game. Defend these Little Spaceman Dudes from Aliens! Blast your way through waves of Alien Abductors and UFOs while defending Spaceman Dudes from being abducted in this fast paced 80’s style modern remake.

title: Little Big Workshop - Good vs Evil Bundle
description: Little Big Workshop - Good vs Evil Bundle

title: BROK the InvestiGator 鳄鱼侦探布罗格
description:
富有创意性的故事和史诗般的冒险题材游戏。
你会选择成为什么样的侦探呢？

title: 《麻布仔大冒险》雏菊服装
description:
空气中弥漫着春天的气息！
快醒醒，穿上麻布仔超级清新的雏菊服装，在阳光下大口呼吸鲜花的味道。
适合进行英勇冒险的季节即将绽放，您能铲除威克斯这个祸害吗？
需具备网络连接才能获取可下载内容。

title: Still Joking Demo
description:
What do mirror reflections do once they have no one to repeat after anymore?
A gripping story that follows your decisions with mind-blowing 2D art.

title: Don't Byte Your Tongue
description: Rage and rise back to the top to reach your robo-lover in this challenging 8-bit retrowave platformer. With every jump counting like your life depends on it, this game will test your skills to the limit. So try your best not to rage and Don't Byte Your Tongue!

title: Secret of Dream
description:
The secret of a dream is a blend of click adventure & first person puzzle game.

You play as a young man named Peter, He does not know where he is...

title: 《EA SPORTS™ PGA TOUR™》
description: 《EA SPORTS™ PGA TOUR™》汇集了四大赛事，由 ShotLink® 技术加持的 Pure Strike 旨在提供优质的高尔夫游戏，还有无与伦比的高尔夫球场体验。

title: 《EA SPORTS™ PGA TOUR™》豪华版升级
description: 《EA SPORTS™ PGA TOUR™》汇集了四大赛事，由 ShotLink® 技术加持的 Pure Strike 旨在提供优质的高尔夫游戏，还有无与伦比的高尔夫球场体验。

title: 梦见雪花～Dream of Tiny Snow～
description: ——“爱”与“死亡”是人类永恒的话题，若加入一点名为“科学”的催化剂，又会发生什么？本作是由反乌托邦风格的科幻短篇视觉小说《梦末》《茸雪》《昙花》所组成的三部曲。

title: 巴别图书馆
description: 携手Ludovik 共同体验这款2D平台潜行冒险游戏，一起探索极具未来主义的巴比伦丛林，揭开巴别图书馆被封锁的谜题，走进神秘造物主隐藏的秘密。

title: Game and Artbook
description:
Immerse yourself in the world of The Library of Babel. The following items are included in this bundle.

• The Library of Babel
• The Library of Babel Artbook

title: The Library of Babel Deluxe Edition
description:
The Library of Babel: Deluxe Edition includes:

- The Library of Babel video game
- 44 track original soundtrack
- 78 page digital artbook exploring character, environments, concept art, and much much more.

title: Rites of Spring Bundle
description:
活化护甲 Rites of Spring 能伸缩扭曲，契合佩戴者，与之建立纽带。护甲上身美观潇洒，还能庆祝下一季的到来。

捆绑包内含：
- 5400 白金
-“Rites of Spring”护甲皮肤（头盔、胸甲、护臂和腿甲）

title: HYPERVIOLENT
description: An anomalous infection spreads through the mines of Commodus Asteroid 27-C. Brutally fight your way through hordes of monstrous foes as you attempt to contain the infection and uncover its dark origins in this gloriously violent, fast-paced retro shooter.

title: Unusual Findings
description: Three friends uncover mysteries in the 1980s. Follow their amazing adventures in a game where your decisions really matter. Be prepared to spin like a record on your incredible journey back to the era of synthesizers, VHS Rental stores, 8 bits games and evil alien conspiracies.

seller.name: ESDigital Games ltd (f.k.a. Buka Entertainment Enterprises)

title: 《Hi-Fi RUSH》游戏原声音乐集
description: 调整唱针，跟着《Hi-Fi RUSH》的原创歌曲一起想象在舞台上表演的感觉吧！本原声带收录了 The Glass Pyramids、Shuichi Kobori、Masatoshi Yanagi 等多位演出者的原创音乐，总播放时间超过三小时！

title: Dying Light 2 + Brecken + Rais Bundles
description: Explore the franchise by upgrading to Dying Light 2 Stay Human. Get ready for an adventure filled with open world activities, the electrifying colors of the modern dark ages where your actions will affect the future of The City.

title: Pandemic 1993
description:
Survival horror set in Japan!
Fight off various creatures, search for your missing wife and child, and escape from the town safely!

title: Kujlevka
description: A flying saucer crash-lands in a distant Russian village, turning a rundown kolkhoz into the first, thin bridge between civilizations. As the first point of contact, you must dictate how this encounter unfolds and ultimately determine history’s outcome.

title: 《消逝的光芒》最终版升级
description: 《消逝的光芒》最终决定版现已推出，为大家带来最完整的游戏体验。其中包含所有 4 款 DLC 和超过二十二款皮肤礼包。

title: Curse of the Sea Rats
description: 展开一段手绘动画风格的史诗“鼠魔城”冒险，在这里，你的伙伴都被海盗女巫变成了老鼠！独自冒险或者本地合作——探索内容丰富的非线性世界，享受趣味十足的动作平台体验，面对极具挑战性的头目，并解锁缤纷多样的独特能力！

title: Lord of Midchester
description: Take on the unenviable task of managing a small town caught between two powerful city-states in this 2.5D RPG! Rebuild your township, explore dungeons, hire underlings, grow your town's prosperity and catch the attention of powerful potential allies or foes... you decide!

title: Outcore - Desktop Adventure
description: Description is All you wanted was to play a nice game. But now you find yourself opening Windows apps like Paint & Notepad to solve puzzles, and searching for files on your computers that you didn't put there... Who is she? Why did she appear on your desktop? Let's find out

title: LAB SORTERS
description: Base game

title: Wall World
description: 骑在巨大的机械蜘蛛上探索《Wall World》吧：采掘宝贵资源，升级装备抵御成群怪物，在战斗之中探索充满异域风情的生态群系吧。 你能活下来并探寻《Wall World》 的秘密吗？

title: Kabaret
description: Kabaret brings together mythical beings from South East Asian folklore in a mystical realm. A dark fantasy folklore visual novel with traditional Southeast Asian games, tea brewing, musical gameplay and multiple endings.

title: Everything is going to be OK
description: "Everything is going to be OK" is a desktop labyrinth of vignettes, poetry, strange fever dream games, and broken digital spaces. It is a collection of life experiences that are largely a commentary on struggle, survival, and coping with the aftermath of surviving bad things.

title: 《Filthy Animals》
description: 《Filthy Animals》是一款适合 1-4 名玩家游玩的多人混战劫掠游戏。化身变种动物，服从犯罪头目托尼（Tony）的命令。横冲直撞，踏上刺激抢劫之旅，并在尝试避开守卫和保安时，利用变种力量和周围的环境……

title: Book of Demons
description: Book of Demons is a Hack & Slash in which YOU decide the length of quests. Wield magic cards instead of weapons and slay the armies of darkness in the dungeons below the Old Cathedral. Save the terror-stricken Paperverse from the clutches of the Archdemon himself!

seller.name: Thing Trunk Sp. z o. o. Sp. k.

title: 《九十六号公路: 关于一个女孩》（Road 96 - About a Girl）
description: 《九十六号公路: 关于一个女孩》是一本互动式电子书，如果您希望了解佐伊和其他重要角色在两部游戏中间发生了什么，此书不容错过。

title: 《九十六号公路：零号里程》（Road 96: Mile 0）- 原声带
description:
再次感受游戏旅程带来的紧张期待，经历佐伊与海翔两人间的情感纠葛。

本合辑中，你可以找到在白沙镇探索途中曾听见的所有原声音乐！

title: 九十六号公路：0 英里
description: 《九十六号公路》的前传，讲述两位来自不同背景的朋友的故事。和佐伊与海翔见个面吧，这里就是一切开始的地方。来挑战您的人生信念吧！

title: 《九十六号公路：零号里程 - 在一起，更强大》（Road 96: Mile 0 – Stronger Together）捆绑包
description:
《九十六号公路：零号里程 - 在一起，更强大》捆绑包收罗了《九十六号公路》新老玩家所梦寐以求的一切。

- 游戏 -《九十六号公路：零号里程》（Road 96: Mile 0）
- 互动游戏书 -《九十六号公路: 关于一个女孩》（Road 96: About a Girl）
- 游戏原声带 -《九十六号公路：零号里程》

title: Crimson Spires
description: This otome-style visual novel blends eeriness and romance into a compelling drama. A ring of deadly towers traps you in the small mining town of Bataille, Missouri with extreme conspiracy theorists, a serial killer, and wealthy vampires. Choose your partner wisely.

title: Vagrus - The Riven Realms Seekers of Knowledge
description: The Seekers of Knowledge DLC introduces a perilous, ever-changing dungeon to explore, extensive questlines, new foes to battle against and the Knowledge Ambition victory condition.

title: Vagrus - The Riven Realms Centurion Edition
description:
Vagrus - The Riven Realms Centurion Edition includes:
- Vagrus - The Riven Realms
- Vagrus - The Riven Realms Patronage Pack
- Vagrus - The Riven Realms Soundtrack
- Vagrus - The Riven Realms: Vorax
- Vagrus - The Riven Realms: Seekers of Knowledge

title: Vagrus - The Riven Realms
description: Embark on a perilous journey across a realm devastated by an arcane cataclysm. Accompanied by a hardy crew, you must trade, fight, and explore your way to success as the leader of a traveling company in Vagrus, an award-winning turn-based post-apocalyptic fantasy RPG.

title: Vagrus - The Riven Realms Vorax
description: The first free DLC for Vagrus features a new Companion for recruitment: the esteemed Undead chef called Vorax. Ready to fulfill the Deputy role of Supercargo, Vorax comes with an extensive loyalty questline as well as unique skills and abilities.

title: Dr. Professor Scientist's Weapons Testing Facility
description: Get in to decimate all enemies from the Great North with a wide variety of available disciplines.

title: 《KOF XV》DLC 角色“金家藩”
description: 要使用该内容，你需要单独购买游戏本体。在使用之前，你可能需要将游戏更新至最新补丁版本。

title: 《EA SPORTS™ PGA TOUR™》豪华版
description: 《EA SPORTS™ PGA TOUR™》汇集了四大赛事，由 ShotLink® 技术加持的 Pure Strike 旨在提供优质的高尔夫游戏，还有无与伦比的高尔夫球场体验。

title: The Chronicle
description: When a mysterious package appears in his living room, Detective Walter Miles is suddenly transported to a World War II Era newspaper building. Can you solve the mystery and escape?

title: Agency Renegades Pack
description: 需要最厉害的人，就将最厉害的他请出场。你的任何隐秘行动需求，都可以让 Agency Renegades 搞定。包含 3 件服装，3 件背部装饰以及 3 件镐。

title: 《Cartel Tycoon》Lieutenants Pack - La Familia
description: “俗话说的好，大家庭中有福同享，但如果是和陌生人做交易……那我就不同意了。”——使用这 5 名各具独特能力的游击队长给你的游戏加入更多变数！

title: 分体吉祥物迪斯科伙伴包
description: 该伙伴包中包含一只限定专属使魔，以及能够帮你更快更远地进行冒险的一系列药水！伙伴是供你分配执行特定任务的 NPC 角色，例如为英雄升级，点击怪兽或使用终极大招。

title: 瞬移犬斯科特伙伴包
description: 该伙伴包中包含一只限定专属使魔，以及能够帮你更快更远地进行冒险的一系列药水！伙伴是供你分配执行特定任务的 NPC 角色，例如为英雄升级，点击怪兽或使用终极大招。

title: 长老神灵史奎特伙伴包
description: 该伙伴包中包含一只限定专属使魔，以及能够帮你更快更远地进行冒险的一系列药水！伙伴是供你分配执行特定任务的 NPC 角色，例如为英雄升级，点击怪兽或使用终极大招。

title: 伙伴任务：英雄捆绑包
description: 伙伴任务系列 3：英雄捆绑包中有 3 个伙伴包，分别是伙伴任务系列 3 中的这些英雄：分体吉祥物迪斯科、瞬移犬斯科特和长老神灵史奎特。

title: Dr. Fetus' Mean Meat Machine - Demo
description: Help Dr. Fetus create the perfect Meat Boy clone in a unique new twist on the tile-matching puzzle genre. In classic Meat Boy fashion, an endless cavalcade of devious and deadly traps stand between you and victory in this hardcore puzzle game.

title: DIG - Deep In Galaxies
description: 《DIG》像是射击版的《马里奥兄弟》，还加入了挖掘玩法。和大部分独立rougelike游戏一样，可以死亡后重来。最最重要的是——你能变得超强，甚至开发出各种强力组合！

title: 《消逝的光芒2 人与仁之战》Chicken Bundle
description: 在城市中建立新的等级秩序。穿上雄鸡服装，化身为一只无所畏惧的雄鸡。割裂与抓伤敌人，让他们像落汤鸡一样狼狈。而你将翱翔于天际，向所有人证明：鸡也能飞！

title: Voodoo Kid
description: You're prisoner on a strange and eerie galleon that is sailing to the Island of Lost Souls. Its captain is Baron Saturday, the King of the Zombies. Use your wits and some friendly hints from the Butler to defeat the Baron and find the way back to the Land of the Living.
developerDisplayName: Infogrames Europe SA, Etranges Libellules Studios

title: UAYEB - The Dry Land - Episode 1
description: You as Uayeb, will explore and survive in a hostile environment, you will find clues helped by your friend archeologist Joanna, to discover Mayan artifacts that will lead you to the lost civilization, you will craft your equipment to be ready for the adventure.

title: Tear of Time - Lost memory
description: You waking up, character realizes was lost her memory. You have to find the reason why, explore, find treasures, solve puzzles

title: Tales of the Orient: The Rising Sun
description: Travel to Edo Japan period and help Satsu and Miyamoto in this epic adventure. Prove your skills in the Challenge mode with limited moves. Dive into an epic story of honor and courage and help a Geisha and a Samurai save the day in Tales of the Orient: The Rising Sun!

title: Apotheorasis • Lab of the Blind Gods
description: Put on your headphones and step into this audio-only first person shooter. Discover the new limits your ears can guide you to, as you go through a fully realized 3D world, fight enemies and interact with a charming cast of characters.

title: tERRORbane
description: 《勇者斗幺蛾（tERRORbane）》是一款以搞笑为主，以Bug为友的冒险解谜游戏。探索光怪陆离，异想天开的世界，结识性格迥异，古灵精怪的角色，游览向电子游戏发展史致敬的种种细节。用你的创意挑战游戏的开发者，成为惊天动地的勇者（bane），与开发者层出不穷的幺蛾子（ERROR）斗智斗勇吧！

title: Video Horror Society - Anomaly
description: 使用我们至今为止推出的最为让人不寒而栗的怪兽，来扩张你的怪兽队伍吧。可以变形的 Anomaly 将以全新的游玩风格让众人疑神疑鬼，让他们哪怕身着全身极地装备也不禁打冷颤……谁都别相信。

title: Smart Thief
description: Smart Thief is a 3rd person theft simulator where you are in the role of an amateur robber who steals every night from different houses/markets.

title: Move 78
description:
The Dark Souls of Escape Rooms

Uncover the mystery behind each of the group's hidden motives and lost memories. What brings them together? What happened to the outside world, and who is The Botfly Killer that haunts their nightmares?

title: ZZT!
description: 《ZZT》是一款面向对象开发的动作冒险游戏。这款游戏需要你拥有快速的反应和周密的计划。内置的游戏编辑器让你能够创造出自己的游戏场景。你也可以使用内置的编程语言来控制物体。

title: The Last Tater
description: The Last Hope in Saving Spud-kind from the Forces of Evil

title: Farm Day 2023
description: Looking for a fun and addictive farming simulation game? Look no further than Farm Day 2023! Develop your farming capabilities, grow crops, and build your own town. With beautiful graphics and a relaxed gameplay style, it's perfect for players of all ages. Start your farming!

title: Gummy Dummy Battles
description:
Create insane and fun battles fought by totally unconventional warriors!
Ragdolls have never been so gummy, dummy, and funny!
Place your units and enjoy the battle, or enter the craziest brawl in the gaming world in first person!

title: 《Troublemaker》
description: 抓起背包，缠上拳击绑带，全心投入高中生活最重要的事情：把对方毫不留情地打倒在地！《Troublemaker》汲取同类型优秀经典作品的精华，为玩家带来了深受喜爱的动作冒险清版元素。

title: Void Prison
description: Void Prison is a fast paced, endless arcade twin stick shooter that puts you inside of an ever shrinking ring. Survive by fighting emerging enemies around you and don't get consumed by the void.

title: Shadow Gangs
description: Shadow Gangs is an arcade style ninja action game. Live The Legend Of Dan The Crimson Ninja.

title: Townsmen - A Kingdom Rebuilt Complete Edition
description: 从一开始就有最大的游戏乐趣--本版结合了我们心爱的城市建设游戏的 "Townsmen - A Kingdom Rebuilt" 和 "Seaside Empire DLC"。

title: The Last Case of Benedict Fox
description: Take on the last case of Benedict Fox and dive into a twisted world of secret organizations, forbidden rituals, and cold-blooded murders. Explore the memories of deceased victims as you search for clues and fight demons in this fantastical Lovecraftian Metroidvania.

title: Witchcrafty
description: Witchcrafty is a metroidvania platformer with magical action gameplay, exploration of a weird world, and adorable pixel art graphics. Help the little witch solve the mystery of strange events in the Kingdom, and defeat enemies with fire, lightning, and ice magic.

title: Cymatically Muffed Supporter Pack
description: This DLC is meant for fans of Cymatically Muffed that wish to provide additional financial support to the developers. We've tried to provide some "goodies" to honor that gesture!

title: Cymatically Muffed
description: 你不讨厌一觉醒来发现一些科学家对你做了实验，偷了你的耳机吗？ Muffed 是一款快节奏的射击游戏，您和您的朋友可以在其中追捕科学家或在 2-16 人 PvP 游戏中互相战斗。

title: Firestone Online Idle RPG
description: Firestone: Online Idle RPG 是一款具有放置 RPG 机制的奇幻多人游戏。收集英雄🧙‍♂️、升级他们的装备和技能、派遣他们进行 AFK 战斗，或疯狂继续加强点击，以击败可怕的Boss！与公会好友聊天或参与 PVP⚔️——选择权在你手中！

title: House Party - Halloween Holiday Pack
description: Enjoy spine-chilling seasonal decorations, sinister costumes, creepy critters, and more in House Party's petrifying free Halloween holiday pack. Keep an eye out for ongoing spooky season updates!

title: 《City of Beats》
description: 在这款节奏 rogue-lite 射击游戏中，探索 🎵 音乐 🎵 驱动之城变幻莫测的天际线。在战斗中化入禅式心流的境界，让一举一动都和节拍同步。射击、律动、劫掠、升级，周而复始。

title: Valfaris Mecha Therion
description: Therion returns as the hunt for Lord Vroll continues. Pilot an advanced machine of death and destruction in this explosive 2.5D side-scrolling shoot ‘em up, and sequel to the critically acclaimed Valfaris. Strap in and unleash mecha hell!

title: Conan The Mighty Pig
description: Conan the mighty pig is a relaxing action-adventure exploration game. In your quest to find all the lost truffles, you must avoid forest creatures and eat plants to gain special powers. There are many interconnected areas to explore, including mountains and caves.

title: 《风暴奇侠The Cycle: Frontier》- Fresh Fortunes Pack
description: 获取一款经过改造的勘探者风格、一件专属武器饰品，以及你可靠的 C-32 手动步枪专用的闪亮新皮肤，在幸宿三开启全新的旅程！请在礼包于 2023 年 4 月 30 日过期之前领取该礼包并登录游戏进行激活。

title: Fortnite Zero Build: No-Build Battle Royale（空降行动）
description: 在《Fortnite》Zero Build - No-Build Battle Royale（空降行动）中展开攻势！Zero Build 侧重《Fortnite》Battle Royale（空降行动）战术方面。秀出你的精准射击，迅捷思考，以及明确的空间感，全力战斗！

title: The Great War: Western Front™
description: The Great War: Western Front is the definitive WW1 strategy game. Play a deciding role in history with this real-time tactical experience as you take charge in the pivotal Western Front from 1914 to 1919.

title: The Great War: Western Front™ Victory Edition
description: The Great War: Western Front is the definitive WW1 strategy game. Play a deciding role in history with this real-time tactical experience as you take charge in the pivotal Western Front from 1914 to 1919.

title: 《世界大战：西方战线》胜利版升级包
description: 《世界大战：西方战线》是教科书级的第一次世界大战策略游戏。在这个实时策略体验中，你将重返 1914 到 1919 年的历史，在标志性的西方战线中扮演运筹帷幄的决定性角色。选择阵营，带领你的将士们获得胜利。

title: 《Insurgency: Sandstorm》Accolade Set Bundle
description: 为庆祝 Sandstorm 4 周年，并感谢社区的鼎力支持，我们推出了 Accolade 套装捆绑包。该捆绑包内容的灵感来自社区，含高级装备和战损武器外观套装。

title: 《Insurgency: Sandstorm》- Worn Veteran Weapon Skin
description:
换上为 Security 设计的 Worn Veteran 武器外观套装，秀出你丰富的战场经验。这些外观可适配六种不同武器。

Worn Veteran 武器外观套装包含在 Accolade 套装捆绑包中。

title: 《Insurgency: Sandstorm》Rust & Wrap Weapon Skin
description: 换上为 Insurgent 设计的 Rust & Wrap 武器外观套装，以沧桑战士的面目步入战场。这些外观可适配六种不同武器。

title: 《Insurgency: Sandstorm》Biker Gear Set
description:
换上为 Insurgent 设计的 Biker 装备套装，将你的敌人踩在脚下。该套装包含六个不同的外观装备组件。

Biker 装备套装包含在 Accolade 套装捆绑包中。

title: 《Insurgency: Sandstorm》Pilot Gear Set
description:
换上为 Security 设计的 Pilot 装备套装，以特立独行的姿态乘上胜利之翼翱翔。该套装包含五个不同的外观装备组件。

Pilot 装备套装包含在 Accolade 套装捆绑包中。

title: The Entropy Centre
description: Think in reverse. Outsmart the impossible. A mind-bending first-person adventure where you solve ingenious and complex puzzles by rewinding objects through time.

title: Age of Undead
description:
Age of Undead is a multi-genre game (turn-based, RTS, FPS) that allows you to face the frightful Zombie Apocalypse with 3 unique factions: the Army, the Infected, and the Survivors.
Make strategic choices in the Campaign, then go into battle and fight to survive!

title: The Last Worker
description: 《The Last Worker》是一款沉浸式叙事冒险游戏，围绕着在一位坚守在日益自动化的世界中孤军奋战的工人展开。为全世界最大的零售店工作的 Kurt，将被迫在资本主义或激进主义之间做出选择。

title: 《侏罗纪世界：进化 2》Feathered Species Pack
description: 用不可思议的《侏罗纪世界：进化 2》Feathered Species Pack 拓展你的侏罗纪世界，其中包括三种陆生恐龙以及一种会飞的爬行动物。这些引人注目的披羽恐龙，将让你的公园获得前所未有的进化。

title: Stellar Interface - Golden Interface
description:
Experience the universe in gold!
Upgrade your spacecrafts to Gold at the beginning of each run!

title: Stellar Interface
description: Run through the universe in this rogue-like-ish space-shooter. Discover the numerous perks/consumables and their synergistic effects. Explore the randomly-generated galaxy to find merchants, unlock spacecrafts, and checkmark your kills of the various galactic Overlords.

title: Stellar Interface - Stellar Spacecrafts
description: Extend your gameplay with five new spacecrafts!

title: Stellar Interface - Deluxe Edition
description: Enjoy everything that Stellar Interface has to offer!

title: Home Wars
description: Do you hate bugs and arachnids? Seeing them creeps you out? Would you like them to disappear off the face of the Earth? GOOD! This is the right game for you! In HW you’ll play as a General of a toy soldiers army, with the sole purpose of saving the owner’s house from the invasion

title: Gripper
description: Gripper 是一款故事主線動作遊戲，座駕自行車擊敗老闆。用抓鉤將你的敵人撕成碎片，挖出他們的金屬心並獲得能力。拯救你的家人，揭開世界崩潰之秘密。

title: 《Smalland: Survive the Wilds》
description: 《Smalland》是以微观尺度进行的宏大冒险！这是一款在宽广而危机四伏的世界上谋求生存的多人生存游戏。你如此渺小，被巨大的生物环绕，位于食物链的最底层，良好的准备是生存下来的关键。制作武器和护甲，建造营地，来探索这片奇特的新土地。

title: 《僵尸世界大战：劫后余生》- Rat Packs Weapon Skins
description: 入手 Rat Packs Weapon Skins，让这群老鼠知道你不畏一切，该皮肤包含有 4 款啮齿动物主题皮肤，每种武器均有一款。

title: 《僵尸世界大战：劫后余生》- Deadly Vice Weapon Skins
description: 以 Deadly Vice Weapon Skins Pack 点亮充满丧尸的街道，该皮肤包含有 4 款高级霓虹皮肤，每种武器均有一款。

title: Skotos
description: Grab your Lantern and plunge into the darkness of Skotos, a terrifying first-person platforming game that will make you brave the darkness to survive.

title: Levels Pack | Skotos
description: With the levels pack for Skotos, you can unlock 9 new levels, new variants of the puppetmaster clown, and new platforms to traverse across!

title: 《循环：前线》- Howler Tamer Bundle
description: 用一套龙蜻兽的装饰品向你的对手展示谁站在这个星球上的食物链顶端。数量有限，每一个都很珍贵，每一个背后都有一个关于生命的故事……另外，还有 1000 金元素奖金！

title: 《循环：前线》- Authority Peacekeeper Pack
description: 一个全新的勘探者形象，多种颜色选择，总有一款适合你。装备自己和你的队友，带上特殊装备和近战武器，跳进空投舱。再加上 1000 金元素奖励！

title: 《循环：前线》- Vivid Party Style Pack
description: 一套令人印象深刻的闪亮武器和“黄金”武器挂件，你可以用它让任何在幸宿三星球上阻挡你的人眼花缭乱，展现你的风采。另外，还有 1000 金元素奖金！

title: Horse Tales - Emerald Valley Ranch
description:
Your vacation at your aunt’s turns out to be far from what you expected. Your once grand family property has fallen into ruins and you find yourself facing a huge challenge.

How to return your ranch to its former glory?

title: 独角兽馬具
description: 为您的马厩增添一丝奇幻气息！ 探索专为您的马匹准备的3套精美的独角兽马具。

title: 限量版 - 数字奖励
description:
该套装包含：

- 额外的名为“吉普赛马”的品种马，让您的马厩更为丰富
- 3套精美的骑士马具，马匹专用
-3个全新的头像服装
- 一个为您的头像准备的专有发型

title: 命运2：军械库收藏
description: 超过20种异域武器，包括著名的加拉尔号角！用3个异域密码和备受喜爱的装饰系列来立即扩充你的军械库。征服两个地牢和一场突袭，同时发现权新武器和护甲，其灵感来自于Bungie以前的装备。

title: Kana Quest
description: A Kawaii Kana Match-Em Up. Learn Japanese. Match Kana (Japanese letters) with their sounds. Solve Puzzles. Your quest to learn Japanese starts now!

title: Crime Boss: Rockay City
description: Crime Boss: Rockay City is an organized crime game combining first-person shooter action and turf wars, playable solo or with friends. Take on the role of Travis Baker – a man with his sights set on becoming the new King of Rockay City, one crime at a time…

title: Terra Nil Deluxe Edition
description: 《Terra Nil》豪華版組合包內含Meydän創作的34首舒心放鬆原聲帶音樂，以及帶有美麗插畫的數位美術設定集，其中收錄了未完成作品、建築物概念美術的縮圖、遊戲部分手繪材質的近距離特寫，以及遊戲最終美術成果定型前所經歷的幾種不同改動方向。

title: Terra Nil
description: 《Terra Nil》是一款错综复杂的环境策略游戏，旨在将贫瘠的荒地转变为繁荣、平衡的生态系统。通过净化土壤、清洁海洋、植树和重新引入野生动物，让死寂的世界恢复生机，然后悄然离开，不留下任何痕迹。

title: 《The Last of Us™ Part I》数字豪华版
description: 进入《The Last of Us™》，在这款荣获 200 余项 TGA 大奖的游戏中，体验那段动人心弦的故事，见证角色们的命运。

title: 《The Last of Us™ Part I》升级至数字豪华版
description: 拥有 The Last of Us™ Part I 数字标准版的玩家可以付费升级到数字豪华版。

title: 《The Last of Us™ Part I》
description: 进入《The Last of Us™》，在这款荣获 200 余项 TGA 大奖的游戏中，体验那段动人心弦的故事，见证角色们的命运。

title: 《Touch Type Tale》
description: 《Touch Type Tale》是一款通过打字进行的独特即时战略游戏，包含了一个具有引人入胜的故事的战役模式，以及能让最为死忠的即时战略游戏粉丝们喜笑颜开的线上竞技游玩模式。

title: Trenches - World War 1 Horror Survival Game
description: Trenches is a First-Person World War l Survival Horror Game where you have to escape the claustrophobic environment and experience the war from the eyes of a soldier caught behind enemy lines in this surreal nightmare as you fight for your life and sanity to get back home to your

title: Barrett Foster Prologue
description: Description is not set

title: 《9 Years of Shadows》
description: 与年轻勇士 Europa 和她化为幽灵形态的儿时玩伴 Apino 共同历险，用战斗将美丽的色彩带回由手工绘制出的黑暗世界。

title: Democracy 4 - Event Pack
description: 这些额外的事件为《Democracy 4》加点料，让游戏更有趣。在一系列悲剧性事件的压力之下，你是能迎头而上，继续掌控国家，并维持投票者对你的尊重，还是会被提前赶下工作岗位呢？

title: Water 2050
description: Take on the ultimate challenge of being mayor of the last city with clean water reserves in 2050. Manage resources, discover new technologies and tackle the global water crisis. An innovative blend of city building, resource management, adventure, and survival all in one game.

title: 未来科技包
description:
这里有霓虹华灯和各种高科技装备，如果你想脱颖而出，就需要更多未来的科技。调整你的装备，准备迎接未来科技包。

包括：
- 神经元分析服装
- 神经元利爪背部装饰
- 神经元利爪镐子
- P33LY服装
- 纳米利刃背部装饰
- 纳米利刃镐子
- CRZ-8服装
- 科技面板8背部装饰
- 幸运8的镐子

title: Out of the Park Baseball 24
description: Play What The Pros Play! Officially licensed by MLB, the MLB Players Inc., and KBO, Out of the Park Baseball 24 is the newest in the award-winning sports strategy series. Fun, authenticity, and depth make it a sports fan’s dream come true.

title: Clockwork Survivors
description: Don't let your hot air balloon down and keep completing lap after lap in this clockwork eat clockwork world.

title: The Last Photon
description: The Last Photon is a story guided platformer drama where the player is in control of the last photon ever to hit Joshua Cloud's brain. There are 50 levels in total, and 51 story fragments, each in one level and the final one after the game is finished.

title: Tetragon
description: 四方世界这个辽阔的神秘宇宙蕴含了各种特别的游戏机制、谜题、魔法迷宫与挑战！你的目标是利用世界旋转的重力，移动平面。考验头脑的时候到了！

seller.name: ESDigital Games ltd (f.k.a. Buka Entertainment Enterprises)

title: Samurai Revenge 2
description: Introducing the highly anticipated sequel, Samurai Revenge 2! Play as Kabuto, the famous samurai, defend your village and country from enemy forces. Old-school gameplay, RPG elements, and high-quality graphics make for an unforgettable experience. Download now!

title: 《麻布仔大冒险》Matte Paint Pack
description:
为你在工艺世界的多彩任务中使用油漆再添颜色，画龙点睛。

麻布仔就是你的画布！将油漆尽情挥洒在他身上吧，无需进行清理！

需具备网络连接才能获取可下载内容。

title: Train World Demo
description: Train World is a railroad simulator that allows you to design, manage and operate your own railway network. Start at the dawn of railroad technology and evolve into a modern railroad company. Deliver cargo and transport passengers, open new regions, and expand your network.

title: Clockwork Survivors Demo
description: Join the clockwork universe and get leveling.

title: Train Sim World® 3: Niddertalbahn: Bad Vilbel - Stockheim
description: 踏上德国的轨道，享受没有任何线缆阻隔的景色！乘上来自过去时代的柴油牵引机车，穿梭于黑森州风景如画的田野和河流之间，体验真实重现的 20 世纪 90 年代德国线路，尽在 Train Sim World® 3: Niddertalbahn: Bad Vilbel - Stockheim！

title: The Case of the Golden Idol
description: A new kind of detective game that allows you to think and investigate freely. Discover clues surrounding 12 strange and gruesome deaths and build your own theory. Pick your suspect, deduce the motive, unmask the awful truth.

title: Demo
description: Kabaret is a dark fantasy folklore adventure game. The story unfolds through the eyes of Jebat, a cursed boy who is uprooted from his small town to a mystical, violent, and unforgiving monster realm.

title: Not For Broadcast: Live & Spooky
description: Direct the "Live & Spooky" paranormal investigation team around a derelict film studio deep underneath Channel One. Frame the shots, capture the action and help keep viewers on the edge of their seats with some TV magic. After all, these ghost shows are all just a hoax... right?

title: Not For Broadcast: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition of Not For Broadcast includes the original game and the Not For Broadcast: Season Pass.

title: Not For Broadcast: Season Pass
description:
Channel One is more than just the news! The Not For Broadcast Season Pass grants to access to all three of the upcoming episodes of Not For Broadcast as they release.

Each episode is a self-contained story, set early into the events of the main game.

title: Chess Ultra
description: 即将推出 Chess Ultra；史上最激动人心的国际象棋游戏。体验精美的 4K 视觉效果、无缝在线多人模式、获得国际象棋大师认可的人工智能等级，而且完全兼容虚拟现实。

title: Chess Ultra：学院游戏礼包
description: 学院游戏礼包是给俄国悠久而高贵的国际象棋传统的献礼，俄国曾产生过数位有史以来最伟大的棋手，以及成千上万的国际象棋大师。

title: Chess Ultra: Easter Island棋盘组
description: Chess Ultra 复活节岛象棋的灵感源于神秘的波利尼西亚复活节岛摩埃石像。

title: Chess Ultra：Santa Monica 游戏包
description: 游览世界上最受欢迎的海滩之一，感受 Santa Monica 国际象棋公园带来的一切体验。

title: Chess Ultra X Purling London Mr. Jiver Chess Set
description: 推出 Mr. Jiver Art Chess 棋具 经 Purling London 特别授权，现在 Chess Ultra 虚拟世界中呈现。

title: Chess Ultra: Imperial棋盘组
description: 用Chess Ultra Imperial棋盘组给棋盘带来奢华感。

title: Chess Ultra X Purling London Olivia Pilling Set
description: 推出 Olivia Pilling Art Chess 棋具；经 Purling London 特别授权，现在 Chess Ultra 虚拟世界中呈现。

title: Chess Ultra X Purling London Nette Robinson Set
description: 推出 Nette Robinson ‘St Basil’s Cathedral’ Art Chess 棋具；经 Purling London 特别授权，现在 Chess Ultra 虚拟世界中呈现。

title: Chess Ultra: Isle of Lewis棋盘组
description: 此 Chess Ultra 下载包的灵感源于路易斯岛国际象棋棋子，其中包含一副由海象牙制作的精致棋子（当然是虚拟的！）。

title: Chess Ultra: Pantheon（游戏包）
description: 此游戏包含有罗马神庙场景，罗马帝国的将士在石棋盘上交锋作战。

title: Chess Ultra X Purling London Bold Chess Set
description: 推出 Purling London Bold Chess 棋具；从备受赞誉的 Purling London 团队打造的独家棋具系列中精心挑选。

title: Quest of Dungeons
description:
Quest of Dungeons is a turn based dungeon crawler game, a roguelike.
An evil Dark Lord has stolen all the light, so your mission is to enter his lair and defeat him. The dungeons layout is procedural so you won't find items/enemies in the same place each time you play.

title: 《Chef Life》AL FORNO PACK
description: 使用 AL FORNO PACK 制作美味的柴烧披萨，为你的餐厅营造意大利氛围。获得 8 种披萨食谱，以及用来装饰你餐厅的各种定制物品。

title: Tiny Troopers Joint Ops XL
description: Tiny Troopers Joint Ops is an epic bite-sized arcade shooter, filled to the brim with action-packed mini maps of mayhem!

title: Tiny Troopers Global Ops
description: 立正！《Tiny Troopers:Global Ops》是一个街机风快节奏双摇杆射击游戏，你将领导一支 Tiny Troopers 精英小队，展开激动人心的任务，击败来自全世界、成群结队的寡廉鲜耻敌人！

title: Tiny Troopers: Global Ops数字豪华版
description:
《Tiny Troopers: Global Ops》数字豪华版包含：

-《Tiny Troopers: Global Ops》（完整版游戏）
-《Tiny Troopers: Joint Ops》
 《Tiny Troopers: Global Ops》官方原声集-

title: Tall Poppy
description: Tall Poppy is a fun-house horror experience where you must find your wife's purse and a way off the church property before the prankster ghost gets you!

title: 地狱角蟾伊斯拉伙伴包
description: 该伙伴包中包含一只限定专属使魔，以及能够帮你更快更远地进行冒险的一系列药水！伙伴是供你分配执行特定任务的 NPC 角色，例如为英雄升级，点击怪兽或使用终极大招。

title: Unreal Editor Fortnite特别版
description: Unreal Editor Fortnite特别版（UEFN）是一款全新的PC应用程序，主要用于为《Fortnite》设计、开发和发布游戏与体验。

title: Gigapocalypse
description: Become a customizable giant monster with manifold skills in Gigapocalypse, inspired by classical Kaijū movies such as “Godzilla” and “King Kong” and the game classic “Rampage”.

title: 《Evil Dead: The Game》- Ash Savini 额外服装
description: 这是一款由特效化妆大师 Tom Savini 设计的原始 Savini Ash 皮肤变体的全新版本。

title: Cities: Skylines - CCP: Africa in Miniature
description: 《Cities: Skylines》推出“Africa In Miniature”：以非洲大陆为背景的内容创作者包，内含 28 种灵感来自现有都会建筑杰作和独特建筑概念设计的新建筑。

title: Cities: Skylines - CCP: Shopping Malls
description: 是时候来点零售盛会了！是时候来点零售盛会了！利用社区模组作者 KingLeno 出品的内容创作者包“Shopping Malls”，让购物体验更上层楼，为你的城市增添各种购物区域。

title: 《Cities: Skylines》- World Tour Bundle 2
description:
这是《Cities: Skylines》“World Tour”的第二站，内含灵感来自世界各个角落的新内容！

《Cities: Skylines》“World Tour Bundle Part II”内含三个内容创作者包与三个电台。

title: Cities: Skylines - Pop-Punk Radio
description: 我们为所有喜爱流行朋克音乐的城市建造师打造了这个电台。如果你喜欢流行朋克音乐，那这个电台正适合你！共有 16 首乐曲，超过 75 分钟强劲有力、节奏鲜明的音乐。

title: Cities: Skylines - JADIA Radio
description: 非洲大陆很广阔，音乐也很多元。JADIA 电台 (Just Another Day in Africa“只是非洲的日常”) 收集了向国家的音乐传统致敬的音乐家 Wan Shey 的 16 首音乐，在《Cities: Skylines》注入新的活力。

title: Cities: Skylines - '80s Movie Tunes
description:
这次我们要带你看电影去！
“80’s Movies Tunes”是个以 80 年代经典电影乐曲为主题的电台。听着超过 15 首乐曲、70 分钟左右的音乐，一同陶醉在过去。

title: Cities: Skylines - CCP: Sports Venues
description: 社区模组作者 BadPeanut 出品的内容创作者包“Sports Venues”，让体育赛季永不完结。无论是专属体育场还是小区运动公园，满足你城市体育需求的一切尽在这个内容创作者包！

title: mummification
description: mummification - Fight ravenous mummies and cooperate with your AI teammates to survive !

title: Catoise
description: Make portals and levitate objects to solve puzzles - help Catoise get back home after a shopping trip in space ends in a crash landing. Collect parts of the damaged ship scattered across this strange planet. Meet friendly and unfriendly animal characters along the way.

title: 漫威暗夜之子 - 异血之渴
description: 莫比亚斯与暗夜之子并肩作战，对抗席卷纽约市的吸血鬼威胁。将莫比亚斯加入您的阵容，还有全新故事任务，修道院升级，更多精彩内容等您体验。

title: 《模拟火车世界® 3》Rail Operations Group BR Class 37/7
description: 掌管当代英国最勤劳的机车：在《模拟火车世界 3》Rail Operations Group 英铁 37/7 型中，体验独特的单位拖拽服务，在梅德韦地区穿行，拖动电力车组来回进行整修！

title: 《模拟火车世界® 3》DB BR 403 ICE 3 Railbow
description: 为标志性的城际特快列车服务添上一抹色彩；从德铁的骄傲行动 10 周年，再到德国全境内举行的诸多游行及庆祝活动。以《模拟火车世界 3》Railbow 涂装城际特快列车 3 号列车来拥抱爱与多样性吧！

title: 模拟火车世界3: BNSF SD70ACe
description: 坐在现代的工业杰作之中，来挑战加利福尼亚地区的严苛山地；在《模拟火车世界3: BNSF SD70ACe》中，你将体验到这款带有一抹橙色的易安迪（Electro-Motive）制运货机车，并与它一起称霸山巅！

title: 《模拟火车世界® 3》Loco Add-On Bundle 2
description: 在《模拟火车世界 3》中接受一系列全新挑战，入手 Loco Add-On Bundle 2，为英国东南高铁线，卡洪山口，卡塞尔—维尔茨堡高速铁路添加更多机车，涂装以及游玩要素！

title: Deceive Inc. Black Tie Edition
description: Go undercover as the world’s greatest spies in this multiplayer game of subterfuge. Disguise as anyone, deploy high-tech gadgets or neutralize the competition. As long as you extract with the objective, no trick is too dirty when you work for DECEIVE INC.

title: Deceive Inc.
description: Go undercover as the world’s greatest spies in this multiplayer game of subterfuge. Disguise as anyone, deploy high-tech gadgets or neutralize the competition. As long as you extract with the objective, no trick is too dirty when you work for DECEIVE INC.

title: 《Deceive Inc.》Black Tie DLC
description: 在《Deceive Inc.》Black Tie Edition 中施展你大师级的乔装打扮功力！

title: Heroines of Swords & Spells + Green Furies DLC
description: Join a team of wayward heroines in Heroines of Swords & Spells, an epic and humorous turn-based combat JRPG with over 150,000 lines of dialogue, 20+ hours of gameplay, and challenging battles. Navigate tough dungeons and uncover the rich lore of the world.

title: 荆棘编织者 Premium Pack
description: 解锁“荆棘编织者”职业以及其全新巨龙，召唤上古的自然之力！此组合包还包含两款额外巨龙，传奇装备，主题自定义选项，不少经验值以及宝石。

title: 荆棘编织者 Starter Pack
description: 解锁“荆棘编织者”职业以及其全新巨龙，召唤上古的自然之力！该组合包还包含一款额外巨龙，传奇武器，主题壁纸以及 14 天经验值增益。

title: 600 Platinum Coins
description: 入手 600 枚 Platinum Coin，拼出更强实力！Platinum Coin 可用来在游戏内商店中购买你心仪英雄的皮肤。抓住计划，提升游戏体验，秀出你的与众不同！

title: Cafe Owner Simulator
description: Open your dream restaurant at FPP. Create a unique exterior and interior, hire the best workers and chefs, create a place where people will love to eat, spend time and spend their money. Simulation of the restaurant business.

title: 汽水物语 - 酿制大亨
description:
汽水物语 - 酿制大亨是一款新奇、休闲的经营管理游戏，你需要在爆火的真人秀《囚徒星路》中负责酿制汽水，与其他选手同台竞技。

你将扮演锒铛入狱的囚犯，在最后时刻被选为著名真人秀的参赛选手。所有人都想成为精英中的精英，名望、财富、减刑，这些令人眼红的奖励意味着竞争必将无比激烈！

title: Train Valley 2 - Editor's Bulletin
description: 《Train Valley 2》原版战役的制作者为你倾情献上：30个不同的关卡等待你前去探索，驾驶列车穿过重重险阻，及时将货物送达。

title: Voodolls
description: Voodolls is a co-op tower defence experience steeped in the dark & mysterious world of voodoo. Trapped in the jaws of hell, four souls are given the chance of freedom by a mysterious Puppet Master who distils their essence into Voodolls.

title: Trinity Fusion
description: 操控多个平行世界中的自己来拯救奄奄一息的平行宇宙。探索黑暗、科幻的世界，享受快节奏、顺畅而又精细的战斗。

title: 《MORDHAU》Lion Set
description: 这套专属护甲涵盖每个槽位，支持全方位自定义，刻画了亮眼的雄狮和希腊神话中美杜莎之死。

title: 《MORDHAU》Continental Voice Pack 1
description:
使用这款全新语音包，用全新的方式向你的好友与敌人们挑衅，调笑并尖叫吧。
该语音包灵感来自各路欧陆文化，将可配合任何历史装备。

title: 《MORDHAU》
description: 《MORDHAU》是一款中世纪多人斩杀游戏。玩家将化身为雇佣兵，参与残酷的战斗，体验快节奏的格斗、攻城战、骑兵冲锋等等。

title: 《MORDHAU》Grotesque Set
description:
此专属套装提供涵盖每个物品槽位的独特配件，并支持全方位自定义。
怪诞套装（Grotesque Set）的灵感来源于米兰文艺复兴锻甲师，以来自深渊的各种怪奇生物为主题。

title: 《MORDHAU》Dragon Set
description: 该 DLC 包含巨龙盔甲套装（Dragon Armor Set）以及巨龙大剑（Dragon Greatsword），这是《MORDHAU》中目前最华丽、最精致的物品。巨龙套装（Dragon Set）的灵感来源自 16 世纪的国王与领导者们穿戴的甲胄，将会为你提供全面的保护。

title: 《MORDHAU》Supporter Pack
description: 针对那些愿意进一步支持《MORDHAU》开发人员的玩家，我们提供了这些额外内容。

title: 《MORDHAU》Continental Voice Pack 2
description:
使用这款全新语音包，用全新的方式向你的好友与敌人们挑衅，调笑并尖叫吧。
该语音包灵感来自各路欧陆文化，将可配合任何历史装备。

title: 《Total War: WARHAMMER III》Forge of the Chaos Dwarfs
description: The Forge of the Chaos Dwarfs 将为《Total War: WARHAMMER III》带来一个全新的凶残阵营，可在 Realm of Chaos 以及 Immortal Empires 战役中使用。扮演 Astragoth Ironhand，Drazhoath the Ashen 以及 Zhatan the Black，来扩张、剥削，统治一切。

title: Out of Bounds
description: 您有 15 分钟的时间来“创建”游戏并“修复”这个疯狂的益智射击游戏中的所有错误💥🔫

title: 梦境魔法意志
description: 这是一款高难度的魔幻策略塔防探索游戏，你需要探索大地图，收集各种卡牌、英雄、魔法进行战斗。游戏中包含非常多的关卡，你需要进行策略布阵，抵御全部敌人的进攻，获得胜利。

title: Bosorka
description: Bosorka is an exciting action roguelike where a young witch saves the world from insidious and cruel demons. Combine runes, master a variety of brooms, and try all possible and impossible spells until you gain enough power to fight evil.

title: De-Exit - Eternal Matters
description: 踏上超现实身后之旅，进入破碎又神秘的记忆之界，冒险带有匿踪要素，快来展开宛如电影般惊心动魄的旅程，探索美轮美奂、韵味十足的体素世界，大显神威！

title: The Ultimate Trivia Challenge
description: How well do you know your trivia? Test your knowledge in 9 of the most popular categories, including Movies, Music, Sports, People, Places, General Knowledge, History, Science, Spelling, and Famous Quotes. Challenge your friends and family in Party Mode (Up to 4 Players).

title: 猫咪的黑手党 - 联机对战卡牌游戏
description:
呼唤超级可爱且个性独特的猫咪们共同战斗的战略卡牌游戏！
游戏规则类似麻将和扑克，新颖的策略性一定会让你无法自拔！
规则简单却暗藏玄机，享受烧脑博弈的乐趣！

title: The Dawning Clocks of Time
description: A classic story of love, war and betrayal on an intergalactic scale. A epic turn based RPG with both sandbox and linear story progression. Take up arms with energy and exciting weapons and skills for the battle of the ages, who will decide the fate for all of humanity?

title: Aftertime
description: Experience an epic journey across utterly mutated yet picturesque world caused by a fallen meteorite that released unknown toxins to the atmosphere. In this new age, humans have become zombies and once again, dinosaurs roam the earth.

title: Europa Universalis IV: Domination
description: 在《EUIV Domination》中重回历史上最强大且最受玩家喜爱的几个国家。这个扩展包为游戏中的几大强权提供了新的任务树、体制改革、阶层管理及事件。

title: 《搜魔人：英雄联盟传奇™豪华版》
description: 《搜魔人：英雄联盟传奇™豪华版》包含：银翼补给站礼包，甜蜜山洞家园礼包，被劫持法术礼包，怒意解放皮肤礼包。

title: 《搜魔人：英雄联盟传奇™》
description: 由《Moonlighter》的创作者 Digital Sun 所开发的《搜魔人：英雄联盟传奇™》是一款发生在英雄联盟宇宙中的动作角色扮演游戏。玩家将扮演塞拉斯，一名刚刚从多年的囚禁中脱身的法师。挥舞曾经束缚你的锁链，从搜魔人的暴政中解放德玛西亚。

title: Fortune Follow: The Mansion
description: An exciting game that will take you through an atmosphere of terror and suspense as you solve challenging puzzles to advance through different rooms.

title: Outer Terror
description: DON’T DIE as you assemble a ridiculous arsenal of weapons and desperately hold out against massive hordes of creatures pulled from a variety of classic horror genres reminiscent of 80s and 90s Golden Age comics and B-movies in this stylish action-packed arcade roguelite.

title: DESTRUCTURE: Among Debris
description: DESTRUCTURE: Among Debris is an intense mix of brick breaker, air hockey and bullet hell set in a post apocalyptic world. Destroy structures, dodge bullets, fire guns and buy perks to lay even more waste!

title: 迷失之刃
description: 《迷失之刃》(Stray Blade) 是一款动作 RPG 游戏，玩家将扮演一个离经叛道的探险者，在博吉的陪伴下前往探索古老的阿克雷亚山谷。玩家将揭晓这个早已被人遗忘的山谷的神秘历史，并且掌握三种阿克雷亚金属的力量，让这片饱受战争摧残的土地恢复昔日的平衡。

title: Grief Trigger
description: Inspired by my own grief journey, join Azrael and The Ghost on an indie adventure to put grief in a grave. Explore your hometown for grief triggers that distorted memories of your late father. Survive the bullet hells and puzzles inside to make those memories nostalgic.

title: 《Dead Island 2》黄金版
description: 黄金版内含扩充通行证。有个致命的病毒正在洛杉矶四处传染，将宿主转变成饥饿的丧尸。存活、进化，然后成为终极丧尸杀手。

title: 《Dead Island 2》
description: 有个致命的病毒正在洛杉矶四处传染，将宿主转变成饥饿的丧尸。您被咬、遭到感染，但得到了超乎免疫的能力；揭开传染爆发背后的真相，查明自己究竟是谁…或者是什么东西。立即预购即可取得班诺伊回忆包！

title: 《Dead Island 2》豪华版
description: 豪华版内含装有两件独特服装与武器的高级角色包，以及黄金武器包。立即预购即可取得班诺伊回忆包的两种独家武器、一种特殊武器加成与技能卡。

title: Homestead Arcana
description: 化身一名耕作巫师，开拓那片早已被瘴气神秘腐化的区域。发掘表象背后的秘密，种植作物增强你的咒语，利用大自然的魔法治愈这片土地。

title: 《滞困：异星黎明》
description: 在《滞困：异星黎明》勇闯新世界，在这款行星生存模拟游戏中，你将掌握一个身处困境的小团体的命运。通过扣人心弦且身历其境的策略玩法来打造你的故事：你要做出重要的抉择以保护你的生存者。

title: 《Evil Dead: The Game》Who’s Your Daddy Bundle
description: 尽享经典节目《Ash vs Evil Dead》中深受粉丝喜爱的内容！

title: 《Evil Dead: The Game》GOTY Edition Upgrade
description: 如果你之前购买过《Evil Dead: The Game》的任意版本，即可通过此升级将其转换为年度版（Game of the Year Edition）。此升级将以折扣价格让你畅享 6 款 DLC 组合包中的精彩内容与其他特色。

title: 《Evil Dead: The Game》Game of the Year Edition
description: 《Evil Dead: The Game》Game of the Year Edition

title: Bramble The Mountain King
description: Bramble The Mountain King is a grim adventure set in a world inspired by dark, Nordic fables. Explore the beautiful yet dangerous and twisted land of Bramble, traverse a wondrous landscape and survive deadly encounters with Bramble's many hideous creatures.

title: ELEGIES Aya
description: 一场火灾让扎克失去了父母和住家。勉强逃出大火的扎克醒来后发现自己在医院。在那里他遇到了一个名叫阿雅的幽灵。她到底是谁，为什么只有扎克能看见她？他们试图一起调查阿雅的过去，很快他们就会遇到各种惊险。

title: 星球大战 绝地：幸存者™ Deluxe Edition
description: 入手星球大战 绝地：幸存者™ Deluxe Edition*，来解锁以星球大战：新的希望中出场的汉·索罗™与卢克·天行者™为灵感的专属装扮品*！

title: 《Evil Dead: The Game》Game of the Year Edition
description: 《Evil Dead: The Game》Game of the Year Edition

title: Bramble The Mountain King
description: Bramble The Mountain King is a grim adventure set in a world inspired by dark, Nordic fables. Explore the beautiful yet dangerous and twisted land of Bramble, traverse a wondrous landscape and survive deadly encounters with Bramble's many hideous creatures.

title: ELEGIES Aya
description: 一场火灾让扎克失去了父母和住家。勉强逃出大火的扎克醒来后发现自己在医院。在那里他遇到了一个名叫阿雅的幽灵。她到底是谁，为什么只有扎克能看见她？他们试图一起调查阿雅的过去，很快他们就会遇到各种惊险。

title: 星球大战 绝地：幸存者™ Deluxe Edition
description: 入手星球大战 绝地：幸存者™ Deluxe Edition*，来解锁以星球大战：新的希望中出场的汉·索罗™与卢克·天行者™为灵感的专属装扮品*！

title: 星球大战 绝地：幸存者™
description: 在星球大战 绝地：幸存者™，这款由 Respawn Entertainment 与 Lucasfilm Games 合作开发的跨银河系第三人称动作冒险游戏中，卡尔·凯斯提斯的故事仍将继续。

title: 末光
description: 探索一个充满猖狂自然之力和破败城市的黑暗梦幻世界。化身为一道微小的光，走上觉醒的道路。对抗自己内心的恶魔并找回平衡。

title: 逐光星火
description: 《逐光星火》是一款科幻叙事游戏。成为来自高等文明的订正者，降临于形态各异的外星世界。引导众生走向繁荣，或将火种扑灭于襁褓之中。通过抉择与策略积蓄力量，突破时空的桎梏前往宇宙中心，决定所有文明的兴衰存亡。

title: Jennifer Wilde Unlikely Revolutionaries
description: In 1921, young French artist Jennifer Chevalier becomes embroiled in death, espionage and revolution, assisted by the ghost of Oscar Wilde. A hand-drawn Point & Click adventure with a unique comic book inventory design

title: Panic Porcupine
description: A Meat-Like/Hedge-Like Mashup! Dr. Proventriculus is snatching up the Chickabirbs! Help Panic blast through over 50 stages of topsy-turvy, spike-laced, slime-drenched, buzzsaw-filled deathtraps to rescue them! And remember, there are no rings...

title: Cepheus Protocol
description: An unimaginable plague has been released in San Francisco, turning the population into mutated creatures hellbent on spreading the Pangu Virus. Inspired by classic RTS series Company of Heroes and World in Conflict, it is up to you to win back the city.

title: The Swine
description: Say goodbye to southern hospitality in the backwoods of rural America. The Swine is a short horror experience that explores isolation, witchcraft, and unforeseen consequences in your rural homestead.

title: Outworld Patrol
description: Outworld Patrol is a side-scrolling action-shooting game inspired by one of the first games I ever played on PC.

title: Everlasting Guilt
description: if you’re into Doom, Furi \ Titan Souls, this game will fulfill your needs with its FPS, fast-paced gameplay that heavily focuses on Boss fights, each with a unique approach that has its own mechanics, and a load of enemies to unleash your anger and test your arsenal upon.

title: Lichenvale
description: Lichenvale is a first person slasher offering fast-paced melee combat mixed with tactical use of spells and dashing around your enemies. Battle through nightmarish hordes of monsters representing your innermost fears in this 90's hits inspired title.

title: Busway Islands - Puzzle
description: 你的目标是在公交站之间创建一个安全、高效的路线，确保途中所有乘客都能顺利搭乘。

title: Active Soccer 2023
description: Early Access

title: The Sorrowvirus
description: On the verge of death of a life unlived, Wyatt Heyll was given The Sorrowvirus by his parents, a substance that suspends the human soul in Purgatory after death; allowing Purgatory's mysterious properties to heal them. As he ebbs, Wyatt's only desire is to be free, forever.

title: Roma Invicta
description: Roma Invicta combines action packed real-time battles with turn-based strategy on a big campaign map. Supply your legions and conquer ancient Gaul turn by turn. Fight by yourself or hand over your soldiers to the AI ​​and enjoy the spectacle.

title: Covid Carl
description: The story follows the player as they attempt to stop a super soldier from a government project to vaccinate everyone. In typical fashion the government project goes awry and he starts mutating people instead. That's where you come in to shoot or burn almost everything that moves.

title: BoltBreak
description: In BoltBreak, you'll battle enemies who possess powers similar to yours, and you'll need to employ your abilities creatively to emerge as the last hero standing. Do you have what it takes to survive in the Super Arena?

title: KITS
description: KITS is an assembly game.  Discover, construct and admire beautiful little works of art.  Set your own complexity and challenge levels and enjoy KITS the way you like to play.

title: Metal Commando
description: Get your weapons ready for the ultimate action game! Metal Commando combines the adrenaline of platform-style games with the action of 2d shooters. What are you waiting for? Start Metal Commando now and let the shooting begin

title: Wild Animal Sports Day
description: All your favourite Wild Animals are competing for the title of Wild Animal Champion of Champions! Tennis, Hurdles, Darts, Diving, Skiing, Pole-Vault, Trampolining and for the first time in a game Rhythmic Gymnastics! But watch out for King Croc!

title: Flyto
description:
Flyto is a 3D realistic looking - open-world, racing and flying bird game with RPG elements.

You play the character of a bird and enter a world where you can race, hunt, interact with other AI birds, and make your story.

title: 《Redfall》
description: 《Redfall》是一款来自打造了《Prey》以及《Dishonored》，备受赞誉的开发团队 Arkane Austin 推出的开放世界合作第一人称射击游戏。本作依旧带来了 Arkane 一贯精心打造的游戏世界与沉浸式模拟，将该工作室的经典游戏玩法带进了这款叙事驱动的射击游戏之中。

title: Redfall Bite Back Edition
description: The Bite Back Edition includes the Base Game, Redfall Hero Pass, Throwback Outfit Pack, Laser Beam multi-weapon skin and the Tactical Knife Stake attachment.

title: Age of Wonders 4
description: 统治你自己设计的幻想王国！在《Age of Wonders》标志性的 4X 战略回合制战斗中探索全新的魔法世界。以回合为单位控制你的帝国，亲眼目睹你的派系的成长与变化！

title: Age of Wonders 4: Premium Edition
description: 《Age of Wonders 4: Premium Edition》包含游戏本体以及Expansion Pass。Expansion Pass 包括前两个主要扩展包以及两个内容包。

title: Ravenlok
description: Ravenlok, an action-packed fable from Cococucumber, is a fairytale reimagining of a kingdom troubled by an evil queen and a young girl’s destiny to fulfill a dangerous prophecy.

title: Poosh XL
description: Poosh your way through the obstacles and see how far you can get in this neon-infused, one-button, arcade score chaser!

title: TT Isle of Man: Ride on the Edge 3 - Pre-Purchase
description: An iconic course for motorbike fans. 200km of open roads to practise on. Challenging physics. A simulation for the best riders.

title: TT Isle of Man: Ride on the Edge 3 Racing Fan Edition - Pre-Purchase
description: Pre-purchase the Racing Fan Edition and get the John McGuinness 100th Start Special Livery DLC, 48 hrs early access and immediate access to the complete RiMS Racing game.

title: 《Georifters》
description: 在《Georifters》的快节奏战场中，地面就是你的武器。和好友组队或进行对垒，展开这场地面爆裂的冒险旅程，使用一系列独特武器和能力，重击传送门，旋转隧道，折射激光，互偷地块。

title: 《Amnesia: The Bunker》
description:
《Amnesia: The Bunker》是一款第一人称恐怖游戏，背景设置在某处第一次世界大战时期的荒凉地堡。

你需要直面黑暗中潜藏的压抑与恐惧，将自己搜索到的各种工具与武器根据情况善加利用，想方设法不让光源熄灭并尽力逃出生天。

title: Outlive
description: Outlive is an intense game of survival! Run, hide and outsmart mutants in a post-apocalyptic world. No fighting allowed, only puzzles to solve. Created by an indie studio founded by a father and son.

title: ENDLESS™ Dungeon
description:
ENDLESS™ Dungeon is a unique blend of roguelite, tactical action, and tower defense set in the award-winning ENDLESS™ Universe.             

Pre-Order ENDLESS™ Dungeon now and get your hands (or tentacles) on exclusive content!

title: 《The Outlast Trials》
description: 本游戏背景设定在冷战时期，当时的 Murkoff Corporation 强迫招募志愿者，测试全新的洗脑和心理控制方法。这个世界充满了怀疑、恐惧和暴力，与你的盟友一起并肩而战，努力在 The Outlast Trials 中存活下来。

title: 《乐高®2K竞速》Awesome Rivals Edition
description:
《乐高®2K竞速》Awesome Rivals Edition 包括：
-飞溅车手包
- 第 1 年驾驶通行证
- Awesome 奖励包
- 550 枚金币
- 3 天抢先体验
- Awesome Rivals 奖励包

title: 《乐高®2K竞速》
description: 欢迎来到积木兰迪亚，大型开放世界乐高®驾驶冒险之家。在任意地方与任何人一起赛车，打造你的梦之旅，击败一群狂野的赛车对手，赢得梦寐以求的天空杯冠军！

title: 《乐高®2K竞速》极乐版
description:
《乐高®2K竞速》极乐版包括：
-飞溅车手包
- 第 1 年驾驶通行证
- 极乐披萨车
- 550 枚金币
- 3 天抢先体验

title: 《九十六号公路 - 全部历程》（Road 96 - Full Journey）
description: 《九十六号公路 - 全部历程》（Road 96 - Full Journey）

title: Grand Theft Auto：三部曲 – 最终版
description: Grand Theft Auto：三部曲 – 最终版

title: The Backbone Series Bundle
description: Experience the mysteries and discover the origins of the Backbone world with the Backbone Series Bundle. This bundle contains both the noir-mystery Backbone and the prequel stories found in Tails: The Backbone Preludes.

title: Daedalic Real Time Tactics Bundle
description: 这款组合包内包含四款战略游戏！入手 Daedalic Entertainment 发行的四款不同的战略游戏：《Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun》《Shadow Tactics - Aiko’s Choice》《Partisans 1941》- Extended Edition 和《Iron Danger》，体验紧张刺激的规划与完美的战术执行。
developerDisplayName: Mimimi Games, Action Squad Studios, Alter Games

title: A Plague Tale Bundle
description: A Plague Tale Bundle includes the entirety of Amicia and Hugo’s heartrending journey through the darkest hours of history at a reduced price, in the two acclaimed games A Plague Tale: Innocence and its sequel A Plague Tale: Requiem.

title: DEATHLOOP + Ghostwire: Tokyo Bundle
description: DEATHLOOP + Ghostwire: Tokyo Bundle

title: 《Deponia: Full Scrap Collection》
description:
耶！Deponia 游戏四合一！

Rufus 的家园 Deponia 是是一颗堆满垃圾废品的星球。一天，来自上层星区（Elysia）的女孩 Goal 坠入（不是比喻，是真的从天而降！）了 Rufus 的臂弯。从那一天起，Rufus 离开 Deponia 的梦想似乎也变得触手可及。

title: WW1 Game Series Bundle
description: 这是一系列激动人心的第一人称多人射击游戏，将会为你带来极度拟真的第一次世界大战体验。无论是武器模型，士兵制服，再到战壕设计与游玩要素，世界大战中的每个战区的每个细节都被精准还原。

title: 《Shadow Tactics: Anniversary Bundle》
description:
为庆祝这款备受好评的游戏的 5 周年，我们推出了包含《Shadow Tactics》完整体验的组合包。
- 原版游戏《Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun》
- 独立扩展《Aiko’s Choice》
- 两款游戏的完整 DLC

title: 《BioShock: The Collection》
description: 体验屡获殊荣的《BioShock》系列游戏。在《BioShock Remastered》《BioShock 2 Remastered》以及《BioShock Infinite: The Complete Edition》中造访欢喜城（Rapture）以及哥伦比亚（Columbia）。合集中包含全部游戏的单人附加内容。

title: FOCUS INDIES BUNDLE: Curse of the Dead Gods + Shady Part of Me + Aeon Must Die!
description: FOCUS INDIES BUNDLE: Curse of the Dead Gods + Shady Part of Me + Aeon Must Die!

title: 《Crysis Remastered Trilogy》
description: 《Crysis Remastered Trilogy》包含了传奇第一人称射击游戏《孤岛危机》、《孤岛危机 2》和《孤岛危机 3》的全部单人战役，并且针对当今的硬件进行了优化。   在这个超值捆绑包里再次冒险。

title: EA STAR WARS™ TRIPLE BUNDLE
description: EA STAR WARS™ TRIPLE BUNDLE

title: ZEN Triple RPG Bundle
description: This bundle includes Operencia: The Stolen Sun Explorer's Edition, CastleStorm II, and Dread Nautical. Jump into the epic worlds of Zen Studios in this bundle!

title: Mafia: Trilogy
description: Mafia: Trilogy

title: 3 Out of 10: Season One
description: Join the ongoing adventures of developers at the world's worst video game studio as they endure antics both absurd and topical. Will they ever make a game that scores higher than a 3 out of 10? Stay tuned and find out.

title: Shadowrun Trilogy
description: Shadowrun Trilogy contains Shadowrun Returns - Deluxe Edition, Shadowrun Dragonfall - Director Cut and Shadowrun Hong Kong - Extended Edition Deluxe.

title: Borderlands: The Handsome Collection
description: The Handsome Collection

title: Epistory - Typing Chronicles
description: Epistory immerses you in an atmospheric game where you play a girl riding a giant fox who fights an insectile corruption from an origami world. As you progress and explore this world, the story literally unfolds and the mysteries of the magic power of the words are revealed.

title: 《Alba - A Wildlife Adventure》
description: 即使是最渺小的人也能造出巨大的改变。与阿尔芭一起拯救她美丽的岛屿以及野生动物，或许还会引发一场革命。

title: 《Cassiodora》
description: 《Cassiodora》是一款受经典射击游戏启发而诞生的中世纪奇幻游戏，拥有独特的游戏机制和场面宏大的首领战。你可以独自闯关或是与最多两名好友同屏合作，一路闯关救出 Cassiodora 公主。

title: 《Goetia 2》
description: 在这款点击冒险游戏中，探索黑暗未知的威尼斯。至于你的目标？你需要设法让你的灵魂与肉体重聚。在一个恼人恶魔的诡计之下，你需要利用你的灵体，来收集信息并解开谜题，进一步探索这个世界！

title: 《Souldiers》
description: 在这个生者与死者之间的广袤幻想世界，为了你的自由而战。在这个包含解谜平台要素，银河城风格探索以及硬派魂系战斗的复古史诗游戏中锻炼你的技艺。

title: Mari and Bayu - The Road Home
description: 在这款合作平台冒险游戏中踏上一段伟大的旅程，与蚂蚁Mari和萤火虫Bayu一起解开谜题，搭乘羽毛随风翱翔，甚至还能骑上一只友善的蚱蜢！

title: 《Bibots》
description: 《Bibots》是一款以未来世界为舞台的俯视射击 Roguelite 游戏。玩家将扮演名为 Tayar 的探险家，控制着一个神经质的机器人，闯过满是怪物、力量和秘密的房间。死去，尝试并重复，直到你面对世界最后的威胁。

title: 《Astria Ascending》- Collector's Edition
description: 入手 Collector's Edition，进一步畅享《Astria Ascending》的世界——包含《Astria Ascending》游戏本体，《The Art of Astria Ascending》，官方原声带以及 Cosmetic Weapon Set DLC。

title: 《Skábma - Snowfall》
description: 大自然的韵律岌岌可危！你是年轻的萨米族人 Áilu，一个对你来说是正常放牧驯鹿的日子却突然变成了一场天外奇遇。用古老的萨满鼓和灵兽的力量来对抗席卷大地的黑暗吧！

title: 《Guild of Ascension》
description: 《Guild of Ascension》是一款具有 Rogue-lite 要素的战术动作角色扮演游戏，融合了回合制战斗和实时动作连击系统。不断攀登高塔，打造武器、学习技能、和动物们交朋友、发现神奇生物，并与身形巨大的 BOSS 们进行鏖战！

title: 《The Forgotten City》- Digital Collector's Edition
description: 《The Forgotten City》Collector's Edition 为那些想要全身心沉浸于古罗马时期的玩家提供了极致体验，具体包括：游戏完整原声带、Francesca Baerald 亲手绘制的数字地图、Sentius 雕塑 3D 打印文件。

title: 《The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk - Ultimate Edition》
description: 终极版（ULTIMATE EDITION）包括《THE DUNGEON OF NAHEULBEUK: THE AMULET OF CHAOS》基础游戏，包含了 3 个 DLC 的季票，一个《Goodies Pack》以及游戏原声带。

title: 《The Forgotten City》
description: 穿梭至 2000 年前的过去，重温被诅咒的罗马古城的最后一天，在这里只要一人有罪，所有人都得死。通过利用致命的时间循环、询问当地人、探索和解决谜题，揭开城市中心的神秘面纱。

title: 《Ashwalkers》
description: 在一个没有规则和公理的危险世界中生存探险。道德困境前，你的选择是唯一重要的事情。你需要管理队伍、食物和装备，在这个拥有 34 种结局的非线性叙事生存模拟游戏中经受历练。

title: 《Astria Ascending》
description: 在这款成熟并感人至深的日式角色扮演游戏中，探索处于混沌边缘的广大世界。体验以辉煌的 4K 手绘视觉效果呈现的一个史诗般的故事，以及奖励丰厚的回合制战斗和大量的可自定义选项。

title: 支持者捆绑包（Supporter Bundle）
description: 本支持者捆绑包包含：《灾厄逆刃》游戏、《灾厄逆刃》原声带以及《灾厄逆刃》支持者礼包（Supporter Pack，包括独家奖励）

title: 《The Dungeon of Naheulbeuk - Deluxe Edition》
description: 豪华版（Deluxe Edition）包含游戏《The Dungeon of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos》、官方原声音乐以及附有数字艺术设定集、额外音乐曲目和艺术作品的《Goodies Pack》。

title: As Far As The Eye Supporter DLC
description: As Far As The Eye Supporter DLC

title: 支持者捆绑包
description: 在此支持者版中将包括《As Far As The Eye》游戏本体、官方原声带以及在《As Far As The Eye》的开发过程中制作的画作、概念图以及其他酷炫的内容。全体开发团队衷心感谢你的支持。

title: 原声带捆绑包
description: 包含《As Far As The Eye》本体游戏以及由法国作曲家 Alexis Laugier（作品包含《Rayman》《LooK INside》《League of Legend - Awaken》等）打造的原声带

title: As Far As The Eye Soundtrack
description: As Far As The Eye Soundtrack

title: 《再编译》
description: 在这款具有浓厚氛围的银河城黑客冒险游戏中，你需要控制一个具有自我意识的灵智程序逃出生天，远离被删除的命运。《再编译》满载激烈的战斗，刺激的 3D 平台动作，各种超能力以及基于环境逻辑的黑客机制。

title: 《灾厄逆刃》
description: 灾厄逆刃 由 NeuroVoider 开发人员推出，是一款快节奏自由移动的轻型地牢平台类游戏，很像 Dead Cells 与 Celeste 的混合结晶。帮助 Kyhra 探索未知的领域，一路砍杀，穿越上古机器的层层守卫，揭开她过去的封印，更有可能让人类获得救赎。

title: 《The Dungeon of Naheulbeuk》
description: 踏入《The Dungeon of Naheulbeuk》的奇怪英雄幻想宇宙。在这款具有挑战性的经典战术角色扮演游戏中，带领一队出乎意料的笨拙英雄。体验一段充满幽默、意外和蠢蠢遭遇的冒险。

title: 《Paper Beast》
description: 这是一款有关于从互联网深处生发的野生生物的探险游戏。一种未名的力量似乎正在打破其平衡。   和奇妙生物们一起揭开这个宇宙的秘密。

title: 《Edge Of Eternity》
description: 本作采用华丽的回合制战斗，你要做的就是跟随达里翁和塞琳娜，在寻找吞噬一切的腐蚀治愈方法的途中，体验关于希望与奉献的宏伟史诗。

title: 《Edge Of Eternity》Digital Deluxe Edition
description: DIGITAL DELUXE EDITION 包括：•《EDGE OF ETERNITY》基础游戏 • 数字艺术画集 • 原声带 • War Nekaroo 皮肤 • Goodies Pack

title: Yomi 2
description: A fighting game in card form. Learn your character, practice combos, and read the opponent's tendencies. Strategic, turn-based card battling that lets you experience the nuances of fighting games like Street Fighter and Fantasy Strike.

title: 猫咪的黑手党 - 联机对战卡牌游戏
description:
呼唤超级可爱且个性独特的猫咪们共同战斗的战略卡牌游戏！
游戏规则类似麻将和扑克，新颖的策略性一定会让你无法自拔！
规则简单却暗藏玄机，享受烧脑博弈的乐趣！

title: Star★Vaders
description: Mecha roguelike-deckbuilding tactical shoot-em-up! Upgrade your deck with impactful cards and master the deep and crunchy turn-based tactics to save the future of humanity in Star★Vaders!

title: Breachway
description: Assemble your crew, load out your ship, and explore the galaxy in this deck-building space roguelike. Your deck is determined by your spaceship's loadout, mix and match equipment to discover different powerful card synergies, and obliterate your enemies in tactical space battles.

title: Mahokenshi
description: 踏上旅途，成为一名强大的魔法武士吧！在一个结合了冒险、战略和卡牌构建的游戏中，选择你遵循灵剑之道的方式。探索天域群岛，构建你的套牌，挑战强大的恶魔，保护这片大地免受腐败势力的侵入。

title: Arcanium
description: Arcanium is an Open-world, Strategy Card Adventure that merges Roguelite and Deckbuilding genres like never before. Control your party of three heroes, craft your deck, unlock a vast amount of cards and items and save the world of Arzu from corruption!

title: 枪与香蕉-Pirates Outlaws
description: 枪与香蕉是一款Roguelike卡牌游戏，操作十分简单。快来挑选一位海盗，在回合制的战斗系统中，管理好我们的牌库和子弹数来击败敌人！

title: Nadir - A Grimdark Deckbuilder
description: Nadir is a roguelike deck-builder with a twist: the cost to play a card is an enemy reaction you can predict. Craft your own cards to slay powerful demons. Gather resources, expand your city, grow in power and conquer the underworld.

seller.name: Black Eye Games Sp. z o.o.

title: Garbage Pail Kids: Mad Mike...
description: Garbage Pail Kids are back in this Long-Lost, All-New platforming adventure. Featuring four playable characters, six secret-filled levels, and a trading-card system, Garbage Pail Kids: Mad Mike and the Quest for Stale Gum is a throwback to the golden era of 80s gaming.

title: 《PHAGEBORN: Online Card Game》
description: 丰富感人的故事剧情与策略性的深度游戏玩法互相融合，铸就了这款沉浸感十足的在线卡牌游戏。搭建强力卡组并选择化身，将敌人彻底毁灭。整个宇宙的命运掌握在你手中！

title: Project Pastorate
description: Project Pastorate is a visual novel set in the land of crime and sin that needs to be cleansed. The Devoters take up such tasks, their unique service whose primary purpose is to preserve the country's safety, and the Pastor — the leader of this post-apocalyptic community.

title: I Was a Teenage Exocolonist
description: 在这款基于卡牌战斗的叙事RPG游戏中度过你外星星球上的青春期。探索、成长、坠入爱河。你在十年中做出的选择和掌握的技能将决定你的人生轨迹和你殖民地的生死存亡。

title: 《Foretales》- Deluxe Edition
description: 《Foretales》- Deluxe Edition 包含基础游戏，原声带与艺术画集。

title: 《Foretales》
description:
在这个剧情丰富的卡牌游戏中主宰世界的命运。

你可以在《Foretales》中以独特视角展开冒险，通过多种玩法风格和故事线拯救世界……或带来毁灭。

title: Astrea Six Sided Oracles
description: An all new dice-deck-building roguelike, Astrea, has you chart a path through the ruins of a lost civilization as one of six brave Oracles. Using an ever-changing deck of dice and enchanted Sentinels, Purify waves of Corrupted foes and a decayed goddess to save the Star System.

title: 《KARDS - 二战题材卡牌游戏》
description: 《KARDS》是一款二战题材卡牌游戏，将传统的收集式卡片游戏的游戏方式与真实的战场策略和受传统策略游戏启发产生的创新机制完美结合。发号施令，掌控全局，在海、陆、空的战场上与其他玩家对垒。

title: 《KARDS》- Starter Pack
description:
《KARDS》Starter Pack 包含你开始自己的卡组收藏所需的一切！

构筑专精卡组和其他玩家作战，在竞技场试试你的战术技巧，玩得愉快的同时获得大量奖励，更可以使用额外的万能牌来进一步扩充你的收藏。

title: 因狄斯的谎言
description: Description is not set

title: Nowhere Prophet
description: 构建你的牌库，踏上这场跨越末日废土的朝圣之旅吧！《流浪先知》（Nowhere Prophet）是一款独特的单机卡牌游戏。你将穿越随机生成的地图，和追随者一起在极具策略性的战斗中取得胜利。发现新的卡牌、构建独属于你的牌库！展现在你眼前的，是一个古怪且支离破碎的世界。

title: 《Roguebook》- New Deluxe Edition
description: 这是一款由《Faeria》的开发者和万智牌《Magic: The Gathering™》的创造者 Richard Garfield 共同打造，拥有独特机制的 Roguelike 卡组构筑游戏。游戏中可以使两位英雄组队出击，用强大的连击打败魔域之书的传奇人物！

title: Roguebook - Fugoro, Merchant of Wonders
description: 顽皮、贪婪，是个用法杖的高手……这个崔顿可不只会一招！招募新的可玩英雄福咕噜，并解锁 50 张新卡牌、天赋和宝物来进行组合，以打败 Roguebook！

title: Guild of Dungeoneering Ultimate Edition
description: Now fully rebuilt and remastered, Guild of Dungeoneering Ultimate Edition is a turn-based dungeon crawler with a twist: instead of controlling the hero you build the dungeon around them.

title: 《Roguebook》Heroes Skins Pack
description: 使用这 4 件独家英雄服装，帅气地深入魔域之书。包括以下人物各一件替换服装：Sharra、Sorocco、Seifer 和 Aurora。

title: 《Roguebook》
description: 迎接具有独特机制的 Roguelike 牌组构筑游戏的挑战。它由《Faeria》的开发者和《Magic: The Gathering™》的创造者 Richard Garfield 打造。组建一支由两名英雄组成的队伍，释放强大的连携技，并击败魔域之书的传奇！

title: 《Roguebook》Alternate Art Pack
description: 使用 3 张牌背和 10 张变体卡牌绘画，以专属的方式迎接魔域之书的挑战。

title: Inscryption
description: From the creator of Pony Island and The Hex comes the latest mind melting, self-destructing love letter to video games. Inscryption is an inky black card-based odyssey that blends the deckbuilding roguelike, escape-room style puzzles, and psychological horror into a blood-laced s

title: 《Void Tyrant》
description: 入手这款战略 roguelike 卡牌构建游戏，跨星际招募海量古怪盟友，入手各种致命武器，探索生机勃勃的星球，加入危险激烈的回合制战斗，一路拼搏拿到 Eyes of Chronos，拯救银河系！

title: 《Animation Throwdown: The Quest for Cards》
description: 入手最爱卡牌收集新游戏《Animation Throwdown》，其中不仅有《Family Guy》，更有《Bob's Burgers》、《Futurama》、《American Dad》和《King of the Hill》等经典动画片！

title: 《Banners of Ruin》Supporter Pack
description: Supporter Pack DLC 包含一小部分尚未完成版本的原声带素材，高清分辨率壁纸绘画，以及更多内容。衷心感谢你的支持！

title: 《Banners of Ruin》Supporter Bundle
description: 在此 Supporter Bundle Edition 中，你可入手《Banners of Ruin》游戏本体以及支持者礼包——包含一小部分尚未完成版本的原声带素材，高清分辨率壁纸绘画，以及其他酷炫的玩意儿。

title: 《Banners of Ruin》
description: 建立卡组，并与多达6个团队角色穿行在城市：黎明之刻中进行一系列回合制战斗。每个角色都可以解锁一套独特的卡牌和能力，以此建立你的最强卡组。

title: 《Deep Sky Derelicts》
description: 《Deep Sky Derelicts》综合了回合制策略和角色扮演，并辅以丰富的战术卡牌战斗和 roguelike 元素。探索废弃的外星人飞船、战斗、抢劫并升级你的装备，这一切均以鲜明的复古未来风漫画审美风格呈现。

title: 幽深密室：复活
description: 集结队伍。打造套牌。保护队友，铲除敌人。正确出牌，你才能在下探《幽深密室：复活》的危险深渊中幸存。

title: 《Ancient Enemy》
description: 《Ancient Enemy》是一款以邪恶势力获胜之后的破碎世界为舞台的角色扮演卡片战斗游戏。尽情享受使用一系列魔法和能力，将扭曲的敌人们统统炸上天。向破碎的荒野出发，最终击败最为致命的敌人！

title: 《Loop Hero》
description: 巫妖（The Lich）让世界陷入了永无止境的循环之中，所有人都饱经无尽混乱的摧残。玩家需操纵一摞不断扩充的神秘卡牌，为英勇的英雄每次独特的冒险循环中设定敌人、建筑和各类地形。

title: 《Fights in Tight Spaces》
description: 《Fights in Tight Spaces》融合了卡牌构筑，回合制战略以及如电影动作片般身临其境的分段式战斗动画。通过学习平衡手牌，节奏以及站位来克服不利的条件，打倒对手。

title: 《Solitairica》
description: 《Solitairica》将角色扮演战斗和富有挑战性的 rogue-like 游戏进程带到了一个全新场景：纸牌游戏（solitaire）的世界！使用各色魔导物品和魔咒，打倒成群不断变化的敌人，击败 Emperor Stuck！

title: 《The Solitaire Conspiracy》
description: 特工大师，我们需要你的帮助。加入充满近未来特工的世界，用对经典纸牌（Solitaire）游戏的高能诠释来击败超级大反派。精心设计、可玩性极高的间谍行动。

title: 《Alluris》
description: 准备在《Alluris》中踏上一段独一无二的旅程吧！你可以扮演一个不情愿的英雄或反派来拯救世界......或者只是从一些伐木工手中拯救一群熊。在这款卡片式角色扮演游戏中，每一张卡都代表了具有两种选择的一天！开拓属于自己的道路吧！

title: 《Faeria》
description: 《Faeria》拥有独特的活动战场，只有在这款卡牌游戏中，你才能在不超过 50 小时的时间内获得所有 300 种卡牌。

title: Paw Paw Destiny_Demo
description: 不应该出生的？一个秘密的故事（宇宙恐怖喜剧），你的伙伴（猫/狗）在遇到你之前。

title: Dr. Fetus' Mean Meat Machine - Demo
description: Help Dr. Fetus create the perfect Meat Boy clone in a unique new twist on the tile-matching puzzle genre. In classic Meat Boy fashion, an endless cavalcade of devious and deadly traps stand between you and victory in this hardcore puzzle game.

title: Still Joking Demo
description:
What do mirror reflections do once they have no one to repeat after anymore?
A gripping story that follows your decisions with mind-blowing 2D art.

title: Train World Demo
description: Train World is a railroad simulator that allows you to design, manage and operate your own railway network. Start at the dawn of railroad technology and evolve into a modern railroad company. Deliver cargo and transport passengers, open new regions, and expand your network.

title: Jawbreaker Demo
description: Will you survive when the world falls apart? Jawbreaker is a survival horror game that will have you running, hiding, and fighting in a terrifying gang-infested society on the verge of collapse. Though that’s not all, once the sun goes down the true fear begins...

title: Planet of Lana - Demo
description: A young girl and her loyal friend embark on a rescue mission through a colorful world full of cold machines and unfamiliar creatures. Planet of Lana is a cinematic puzzle adventure framed by an epic sci-fi saga that stretches across centuries and galaxies.

title: Clockwork Survivors Demo
description: Join the clockwork universe and get leveling.

title: 《Forspoken》试玩版
description:
借助这部特别定制的试玩版，体验《Forspoken》的部分精彩内容，并进一步了解这款动作角色扮演游戏。

《Forspoken》将于北京时间 2023 年 1 月 25 日面向全球玩家推出。

title: SteamWorld Build Demo
description: In SteamWorld Build, the steambots establish a mining town to excavate ancient technology that can take them into space. Can you effectively manage resources, tend to the ever-growing needs of the citizens and defend their mine from the creatures that lurk down below?

title: 《孤岛惊魂 6》免费试玩
description: 免费试玩《孤岛惊魂 6》。

title: Football Manager 2023 Demo
description: Dynamic, true-to-life management experiences deliver football authenticity like no other game can. You are empowered like never before to develop your managerial prowess and reach elite status.

title: 《The Riftbreaker Prologue》
description: 你可以在《The Riftbreaker》前传中体验发生在主线剧情章节之前的事件。探索一颗全新的星球，收集资源，建造基地，在成千上万外星生物的攻势下自保。

title: The Bunny Graveyard DEMO
description: Skye and her Handy Pals are looking for a new pal to help them out on her lovely lil' garden! Think you're up for the job?

title: MONOPOLY® MADNESS DEMO
description: MONOPOLY® MADNESS DEMO

title: Alder Choke DEMO
description: How many deaths will it take you to finish the Alder Choke Demo? Try it now for free!

title: RAWMEN: Open Beta
description: RAWMEN is an outrageous multiplayer battler that cooks up a refreshingly tasty take on the arena shooter. Dine solo or call on your broth buds to feast as a party of up to four in food-based fighting across locales around the world.

title: Demo
description: Kabaret is a dark fantasy folklore adventure game. The story unfolds through the eyes of Jebat, a cursed boy who is uprooted from his small town to a mystical, violent, and unforgiving monster realm.

title: Jack Move: I.C.E. Breaker
description: Jack Move is a JRPG that features a unique blend of gritty cyberpunk storytelling, turn-based battles, and beautiful modern pixel art. In I.C.E BREAKER you will meet Noa for the first time and learn where her story begins!

title: Disney Dreamlight Valley - Avatar Designer Tool
description: Disney Dreamlight Valley - Avatar Designer Tool

title: Commandos 3 - HD Remaster Demo
description:
Fall in, soldier! Commandos 3 – HD Remaster sends you to the relentless and unforgiving battlefields of Europe.
Help the Allies to victory in high definition, with improved controls and user interface.

title: Tower Princess: Knight's Trial
description: A charming 3D roguelite platformer about a normal day in the life of a knight! Tower Princess: Knight's Trial is a free-to-play ver. of Tower Princess with an epic boss-fight, three Princesses to rescue and tons of fun!

title: 《True Fear: Forsaken Souls》Part 2 Demo
description: 最迷人的恐怖逃脱游戏之一的续作。揭开神秘面纱下的秘密！

title: Nova Lands: Emilia's Mission
description: Nova Lands: Emilia's Mission is a prologue chapter of the main game, Nova Lands. Learn your way around the planet you've landed on, build your base, and automate it with your helpful bots!

title: 战场的赋格曲 体验版
description:
此游戏是战场的赋格曲的体验版。
体验版可以免费游玩到第三章结束，体验版的存档可以被正式版继承使用。

title: Matchpoint - Tennis Championships DEMO
description:
The season starts now – grab your racket and become the world’s next tennis champion!
Matchpoint – Tennis Championships is a modern take on tennis, featuring a true-to-life on-court experience supported by a deep career mode and unique rivalry system.

title: Dogfight - Demo
description: Jump into this explosive action demo filled with, signature humor, and thrilling adventure. Join the Sausage Bomber Corps for daring missions against the world-conquering ambitions of the mysterious Vega Nation!

title: 《Good Company》试玩版
description: 《Good Company》是一款建立创新型科技公司的深度管理模拟游戏。立即免费下载试玩版，体验战役（Campaign）模式中的三个关卡！

title: 《双人成行》——好友通行证
description: 免费下载“好友通行证”*和好友一起畅玩《双人成行》。只要找一位拥有完整游戏的朋友，免费下载好友通行证，就可以一起游戏！

title: 《Saints Row》老大工厂
description: 曾梦想有天能打造出自己真正想成为的老大吗？《Saints Row》的老大工厂就是能实现这个梦想的地方，你将能打造出史上最具个人特色的老大。你心目中的完美老大。使用《Saints Row》系列有史以来功能最强大的自定义工具，释放你内心的“圣徒魂”。

title: 《True Fear: Forsaken Souls》Part 1 Demo
description: 解开房屋的奥秘，并揭开黑暗的秘密，来发现真正的恐惧！

title: Ravenous Devils - Demo
description: A horror cooking simulator where the secret ingredient is crime. Improve your shops by buying new tools and serving your customers. Learn the basics in this blood-soaked demo.

title: NAIRI: Rising Tide - Prologue
description: This prologue is a playable demo that gives a sneak peek of things to come in Rising Tide, the highly anticipated second chapter of NAIRI!

title: The Alien Cube - Demo
description:
This Demo contains the first part of the game. 
Discover terrifying secrets as you follow your uncle’s disappearance, and confront a terrible truth that will change your life forever in this first-person cosmic horror.

title: 《Zorya: The Celestial Sisters》Friend Pass
description: 邀请一位好友，在本试玩版中游玩前五个关卡，或与拥有完整游戏的好友一起游玩完整游戏。在这款荣获奖项的合作解谜游戏中，和一位朋友一起进行试玩，扮演 Aysu 或 Solveig，来帮助姐妹女神团圆。

title: 《幽灵行动：断点》 Ghost Recon Breakpoint Free Trial
description: 5 月 27 日至 5 月 31 日，免费游玩！如果决定购买游戏，还可继承进度。

title: 《UnMetal》试玩版
description: 在该试玩版中扮演 Jesse Fox，一位因冤罪而被逮捕的行动力爆表的男人。在 Jesse 通向甜蜜自由的路上，他需要使出浑身解数，进行干扰，击倒和欺骗，甚至有时候可能还要将敌人炸上天。

title: 《Bonfire Peaks》试玩版
description: 在《Bonfire Peaks》试玩版中，开始你的巅峰攀登之旅吧。畅玩来自完整版游戏的开头的几十个谜题，探索地上世界，将过往留在身后。

title: Flat Heroes Demo
description: 想亲自感受紧张的操作吗？想体验高难度的挑战吗？机会来了！立即下载免费试玩版，尝试所有游戏模式。

title: The Plane Effect: The Prologue
description: The Plane Effect: The Prologue

title: 《Against The Storm- Royal Woodlands》试玩版
description: 游玩一款以从未停止下雨的幻想世界为舞台的全新演示版 Roguelite 城市建造游戏。在世界地图上的皇家林地（Royal Woodlands）区域修建定居点，快速了解这款游戏丰富的可重玩性。

title: Godot Engine
description: Godot Engine 是一款整合的跨平台游戏引擎，您可以通过它轻松创建各种 2D 与 3D 游戏。它自带各种使用功能，并为您提供了一套适用范围广泛的工具，因此您可以专注于最重要的事情——制作自己的游戏。

title: OBSKUR
description: An all-in-one broadcasting suite to take webcam & VTuber content to the next level! Interact with your audience, monitor engagement, generate revenue, and grow your community. Perfect for streamers who want to focus on making great content without the hassle.

title: Outplayed
description:
截取。浏览。分享。
Outplayed —— 为玩家们准备的终极视频截取应用。在你游玩游戏时，该应用将会自动截取你的最佳瞬间和最棒游玩。
赛局结束之后，便可在比赛时间线上进行回顾，观看你的最棒（和不那么棒的）瞬间。

title: 《RPG in a Box》
description: 实现你的故事和创意！《RPG in a Box》是一款简明易懂的游戏制作工具，能够以简单有趣的形式创建游戏与其他互动体验。

title: GOG GALAXY
description: 发现各种精心挑选的经典游戏与近期推出的最新大作，并在离线时进行游玩。创建你的跨平台游戏库：运行、游玩并管理你在 GOG 与 Epic Games 等众多平台上的游戏。

title: Razer Cortex
description: 提升你的系统性能，以及视觉效果，帧率，载入时间以及更多内容。包括 PC 游戏价格比对工具。以上功能及更多内容，均包含在一个强力应用中。

title: TIDAL Music
description: 使用 TIDAL 来提升你的音乐流媒体体验，以诸如 HiFi（高保真）以及 MQA（Master Quality Authenticated）等高级格式，来畅享超过九千万首音乐以及超过 450000 个视频

title: Antstream Arcade
description: 海量复古游戏一网打尽！Antstream Arcade 拥有超过 1000 款复古游戏，是目前最大的复古游戏云平台。独一无二的现代复古游戏体验，包括多项集成特色，例如挑战（Challenge）、多人模式（Multiplayer）和锦标赛（Tournament）等。

title: NASA XOSS MarsXR Editor
description: NASA XOSS UE5 Editor 将为你提供一系列基础工具，为美国国家航空航天局火星扩展现实挑战（NASA MarsXR Challenge）打造你自己的火星地表使用的多用户舱外活动（EVA）。

title: Beyond CAD
description: Beyond CAD 是为运输以及其他土木工程项目打造的最为强大的 3D 可视化引擎。你可以花费更少的时间与预算，来实现行业领先的 3D 图像和视频渲染。

title: Beyond Typicals
description: Beyond Typicals 是一款无比简单却又异常强大的典型断面图制作工具,可以为城市规划师、道路设计师、公共官员、承包商、土木工程师、项目经理、地方倡导者等所用。

title: Humble
description: Humble

title: N0va Desktop
description:
miHoYo's live wallpaper app.
Simply click the desktop to wake Lumi up.
Enjoy an immersive experience with a lovely companion that's always by your side!

title: Opera GX - 首款为玩家而生的浏览器
description: 您可以借助内置的 CPU、内存和网络带宽限制器，以及侧边栏中集成的 Discord 与 Twitch，获得无与伦比的游戏和浏览体验。通过免费 VPN 与内置的广告拦截器，享受兼具浏览速度与私密性的网页浏览器。

title: Discord
description: Discord 可让你为你的社群和好友打造一个美好的家。在这里，你们可以保持密切联系，通过文本、语音和视频开心畅玩。

title: 《KenShape》
description: 《KenShape》可通过组合各种形状绘制的 2D 像素图来生成 3D 模型。本软件输出的模型可兼容多数游戏引擎，任何拥有基础绘画技能的用户都可为他们正在制作的游戏或者其他项目生成高质量的 3D 模型。

title: itch.io
description: itch.io 应用 itch 让你从 itch.io 下载并运行游戏和软件。你下载的全部内容都将集中存储，并自动进行更新。通过应用内浏览器，来查看你的收藏与购买，或浏览商店，寻找新游戏。

title: 《Krita》
description: 《Krita》是一款为画师，概念草图绘师，画家，漫画创作者，哑光画家和纹理贴图画家以及特效而设计的开源桌面绘画软件。

title: Brave
description: 来为你的游戏生涯增添一把火热速度以及无与伦比的隐私保护体验。Brave 将为你清除那些拖慢性能的鬼祟广告以及追踪程序。而结果是？一款比其他浏览器快 3 倍的产品，将为你节省可贵的电池寿命。现在就加入 2900 万以上用户，来使用 Brave 吧！

title: Spotify: Music and Podcasts
description: 使用 Spotify，你可以免费播放数以百万计的曲目。聆听你最爱的曲目，并畅享来自全世界的音乐。• 搜索你最爱的歌曲，艺人或专辑。• 发现全新的音乐，视频和 podcasts。

title: The Bus - Modding Editor

title: LEAP Mod Editor
description: 《LEAP》是一款快节奏多人第一人称射击游戏，其中多达 60 名武装到牙齿的玩家将掀起史诗级的战斗。使用模组编辑器来创建地图，修改游戏平衡性，或在《LEAP》的生态系统之内打造全新的游戏。

title: 《Thunder Tier One》Modding Tool
description: 《Thunder Tier One》Modding Tool 将允许玩家添加或修改任务、武器、AI 行为、装备以及其他一切游戏要素。

title: Bus Simulator 21 - Modding Kit
description:
Enhance your bus driving experience by creating your own buses, maps , decals as well as exterior skins, interior designs and more with the 
official Bus Simulator 21 modding kit.

We can't wait to see all of your creations.

description: OHDcore is built on top of Unreal Engine 4. Utilize the tools and workflow your team is already familiar with in Unreal Engine, enhanced with the features of OHDcore. Don't reinvent the wheel, use OHDcore to speed up development of your next Unreal project.

description: 《Post Scriptum》是一款第一人称射击模拟游戏，提供拟真的第二次世界大战战斗体验。本游戏专注于历史还原、大规模战斗和险恶的战场，要求玩家有极强的凝聚力、交流能力和团队配合。

description: The Mars 2030 Editor is an open source version of Mars 2030 that contains all of the content and systems found in the VR project to develop your own space concepts using real NASA data! Build your own space habitat designs, create your own robotic NPC companion using NASA’s Va...

description: Create custom maps for Days of War. Days of War is an online FPS that re-imagines the team-based, close quarters, nonstop action of classic World War II multiplayer shooters.
